rows.title: Power Creator Xenon By MythicLegendary
rows.titleText:
The apotheosis event has arrived. Since the activation of Icarus I and Icarus ll, fractal effigies of unknown origin, certain psychoactive substances have
been shown to grant incredible anomalous abilities, namely DMT, LSD. and Psilocybin. Under the auspices of Project MKULTRA and psychotronic projects
by the KGB. experiments with various psychoactives produced the first superhumans. and the population at large would follow: near-death experiences.
vivid dreams. and the hippy revolution of the late 20th century created the first wave of Supers, and their children made up the next one. The year is 2045.
A century has passed since man first donned his cape. It is time to take up that mantle once more.

(Do note there is a number of rules in the original that are in the flavor text but not done automatically. There are a number of thing that are impossible to do on the back end so you might have to follow the rules your self sorry for the inconvenience.)

rows.title: Your Listing
rows.titleText:
Points are exponentially more valuable when spent in higher quantities. and
this CYOA is balanced around that principle. There are no required options,
and you are not even necessarily required to have powers. Many of the
options within this CYOA are open ended and highly customizable. and you
are encouraged to formulate and describe your choices to a level of detail
you see fit.

While reasonably there exists any number of high—level and low—level Supers.
generally they keep to their own; blockbusters seldom have business with
small-time. low-level Supers, just as they seldom have business with random
civilians.

objects.text: This for if you are making your S-Flash build that you due separately from your normal build.

objects.title: S-Flash Build T2 With Hypermutation T2

objects.title: S-Flash Build T2 With Hypermutation T3
objects.text: This for if you are making your S-Flash build With Hypermutation that you due separately from your normal build.

objects.title: 1st Gen. Supers (70-100+ Y.O.)
objects.text:
If you do not have some sort of
trait which allows you to retain
your physical prime far beyond its
natural terminus, you're likely a
retired Super who happened to live
far beyond your typical years. You
are a veteran of events spanning
from the aftermath of World War 2
to the modern age. if not longer.
You’ve seen legendary heroes rise and fall, seen villains whose names are
spoken with a gulp live and die, and seen revered bloodlines form
between them. You were there when the Soviets dropped the bomb on
Manhattan, and you were there when the first heroes stopped it. You were
there to see the first man fly.

objects.title: 2st Gen. Supers (40-69 Y.O.)
objects.text:
If you haven't left the cape and
mask behind, you're reaching the
age where you should consider it.
While it is largely dependent on
your age. your physical prime may
be long behind you. or only just
beginning to slip. Though the
glory days are over. your sheer
experience puts you in animmensely advantageous position to shape the next generation. Your
children and wards will be the next greats. just as you have already
proven yourself to be. With all of that said, you've still got some grit in
you, and you're not out of the ring yet: you wouldn't have made it this
long in your line of work if you weren't a force to be reckoned with.

objects.title: 3st Gen. Supers (20-39 Y.O.)
objects.text:
3rd Gen. Supers (20—39
Y.O):
Yours is the current pantheon. The
world of Supers is shaped by your
decisions. your actions. your
causes. That said, the scope of
your work may largely depend on
your powers and your public
appeal. becoming a “blockbuster"
Super on the worldwide stage or
remaining in small-time work like

bank heists or stopping unpowered crime. Whether you're the type to
bask in the limelight or maximize your strength in the shadows. the world
is waiting on you to make your mark on it.

objects.title: 4st Gen. Supers (<20 Y.O.)
objects.text:
4th Gen. Supers (<20
Y.O.):

The world has plans for you, son.
Whether you're an aspiring hero
taking on wardships. an ambitious
young villain who sees the world
as their plaything. or simply
someone who wants to see how far
they can take their new powers.
you've got great things ahead of
you. Some Fourth Generation

Supers are true prodigies. able to take on the blockbusters and the
veterans by sheer talent decades before most; others have a long way to
go before they’re ready. The world will be watching, with no shortage of
high expectations.

objects.title: Human
objects.text:
The most common group on Earth. who fall under the species Homo
Sapien. The vast majority of individuals possessing superhuman powers
are either humans or mutaforms. with mutaforms making up no more than
a tenthof the powered population and a twentieth of the general
population. Your fully human physiology makes you more easily relatable
to the populace at large. and less readily distinguishable when out of cape.
Moreover. you may avoid much of the complications that could come with
a drastically different physiology in public places or everyday life. While
society has largely adapted to the existence of mutaforms and to a lesser
degree nonnatives. it should not be expected that most people wouldn't
stare if you were a Mutaform. and the same applies for the miniscule
portion of the population composed of earth nonnatives.

objects.title: Mutaform
objects.text:
When the first Supers were created through psychotronic experiments.
unrefined testing methods created a number of side effects. including a
number of mutations both in the powers of the subjects and the subjects
themselves. The initial superhuman population, and subsequently their
offspring. occasionally possessed unnatural biological traits. such as
bioluminescence. prehensile tails. unusual skin pigmentations. and the
like. Their children, even if they didn't inherit powers from their father or
mother. would subsequently inherit their mutations. The subspecies Homo
Morpheus consists of such individuals. Only about a tenth of Supers have
such traits. and only about one in twenty within the general population do.
These may range from minor traits like unusual eyes or hair to otherwise
impossible skin tones. additional extremities. and more.

objects.title: Nonnative
objects.text:
While extraterrestrial consciousness other than Morphic Entities has yet to
make contact with Earth, extradimensional Earths have been readily
accessed by sufficient superhuman technologies. in which the Earth and its
sentient populations have evolved in dramatically different conditions.
However, our earth seems to be unique in that our species developed a
much greater capacity for the archetype—form consciousness which allows
people to acquire powers. That is. on other Earths. the Titans and Morphic
Entities exist. but without superhuman forces to protect them, their
populations were devastated beyond repair. As such, a very small portion
of the population consists of survivors from alternate Earths and their
subsequent offspring. They. in general. possess a drastically smaller
chance of developing superhuman powers. but are still capable of doing
so. albeit at a rate one hundred times smaller than our earth's population,
for whom only one in thirty thousand possess superhuman abilities to
begin with. These species and their populations vary. though are usually at
least somewhat humanoid due to the comparable conditions of alternate
earths. If you do possess superhuman powers. you are undoubtedly in the
minority for your species, whichever that may be. This option allows for a
greater degree of body customization than a Mutaform. but precludes
one's status as an outsider from naturalized human society for the most
part. If you desire. you may be a true extraterrestrial from the far reaches
of space. though you will be the sole member of your kind on Earth.

objects.title: Born Super
objects.text:
You're the descendant of a long
and pure bloodline of Supers.
whose powers may extend back
almost a hundred years. The
circumstances of your birth.
whatever they were. were no
accident: your mother was
carefully selected for your father
and vice versa to make certain not
only that you would have powers.

but that you would have optimal powers. Because of how powers pass
down. you are more likely to have a Type. and if you do possess Aberrant
abilities, they are likely similar to your parents'.

objects.title: Psychedelics
objects.text:
How you got a hit of psychedelic
drugs with such strict government
enforcement is nothing short of a
miracle: that. or you were dosed
under the auspices of projects like
MKULTRA as a government guinea
pig. Whatever the case. your
euphoric epiphany has induced a
Flash event, and granted you
incredible superhuman abilities.

The majority of older Supers were created in this way. creating the initial
surge in the superhuman population that cemented them into the world.

objects.title: Lucid Dream
objects.text:
Endogenous DMT within the body.
while typically insufficient to cause
any notable effect. can be created
as a byproduct of
neurotransmitters released during
sleep. Even this trace amount.
however. can induce superhuman
abilities in rare cases. As the Super
dreams. they will be given visions
of their powers' previous owners

utilizing the power to its fullest potential. In almost all cases. this is an
anomalous entity. unless the powers were stolen, copied. given. or
inherited.

objects.title: Near-Death Experience
objects.text:
Psychedelics aren't the only way to
get superhuman abilities. The
brain releases a flood of
endogenous DMT when someone
has a traumatic or near-death
experience. and in rare cases this
may be enough to induce a Flash
event. Such was the case with you.
and more likely than not. your
powers are somehow related to the
event which induced them.

rows.title: Archetype
rows.titleText:
Archetypes scale along the horizontal axis from idealism to individualism to
utilitarianism. Archetypes scale on the vertical axis from good pursuits to
natural pursuits to evil pursuits.

objects.title: Paragon
objects.text:
You are a pure. incorruptible agent of good. for
whom doing good is a philosophical goal. You
represent what man strives to be. but seldom
lives up to: one who aims toward lofty moral
ideals. for whom the ends do not justify the
means. for whom right and wrong is as distinct
as night and day. and who chooses good over
evil, even when evil would be easy. or effective.
or both.

objects.title: Hero
objects.text:
Your conscience guides your every action. and
with little exception it leads you towards the
work of a champion. helping the helpless and
making the world a better place for us all. Your
own moral compass is. to you. a reflection of
what real goodness might look like. and you
follow it beat-by—beat, even when it would be
effective to act in cruelty. cunning, and
dishonesty.

objects.title: Antihero
objects.text:
Though your aims may be noble. your methods
can be be far from it. In all matters of morality.
the ends justify the means; saving two lives by
ending one or torturing criminals to receive
vital information might be perfectly moral in
your eyes. so long as the end result makes the
world a better place.

objects.title: Vigilante
objects.text:
You do what you do because. on a
philosophical level. you know it to be best.
Your ideals may sway towards the selfish or the
selfless, but you are guided by a principle that
you don't feel is morally wrong. Selfish,
perhaps, or against the grain, but not wrong.
Revenge, theft from the rich, the slaying of the
wicked and the cruel. or other such aims may
fall into this category.

objects.title: Independent
objects.text:
You do what you think is right. whether that is
moral or immoral. What you do. you do for its
own sake, and not because you care for the
lofty ideal of moral rightness or because you’re
willfully evil. When you act, you act on your
own terms.

objects.title: Rogue
objects.text:
You aren't enslaved to an overarching ideal
other than your own objectives, whatever they
may be and however they may shift. Some
might call this kind of viewpoint egoistic. but
you would call it freedom. You may be an
altruist if you see fit. or a miscreant when you
have to. or some combination therein.

objects.title: Radical
objects.text:
You are what the world calls evil, but you know
that the masses wouldn't know evil if it stared
them in the face. When you act, you act in
principle. and those principles are
objectionable if not abominable to the average
person. Philosophies of eugenics. or total
anarchism. or a world with you as its autocratic
head may fall under this alignment. though
with time you're certain anyone can see past
their narrow views of morality and understand
that your way is the right one.

objects.title: Villain
objects.text:
Your morals aren't complex; you're simply bad
to the bone. Your aim is your own benefit, and
you could frankly care less how that affects the
condition of others if they get in your way. You
have no qualms with doing what others might
hesitate to. That said. you have at least some
practical restraint. to keep things classy; you
might not outright slaughter people who aren't
in your way. or have mercy on those who bow
before you. for practical reasons.

objects.title: Monster
objects.text:
You have chosen, willfully and totally, to
pursue your own goals without any qualms or
restrictions. If this means massacring,
genociding. and torturing every living soul on
Earth, you could care less. The only thing that
matters is what you want. and everything that
gets in your way will be stomped underfoot for
even the most minor inconvenience, or simply
on a whim. Nothing is off—limits. and what you
do. you do for reasons only you could ever
understand. and which nobody could ever
justify.

rows.title: Morphic Patron Entities
rows.titleText:
Morphic Entities are beings from negative—dimensional subspaces who mask
the antipattern of anomalies. controlling their behavior in a specific way to
create a power. Any anomaly previously masked by a Morphic Entity may be
acquired by an advanced archetype-form consciousness, such as a human
under the influence of cognition-altering drugs. While most powers acquired
by humans are left by dead Morphs, some are occupied, and only offer
influence over their anomaly for an exchange. Others may seek to share the
anomaly you occupy in a symbiotic relationship.

While you are not required to take any of these options. the entities may
offer you extensive power or significant advantages in exchange for a shared
position of control. You may have multiple Symbiotic Patrons, but only one
Egregore Patron.

rows.title: Egregore Patrons
rows.titleText:
Egregores are absurdly high-level Morphic Entities who have territorial claim
over innumerable highly coveted powers. and often the powers they cultivate
are superior to those which are unclaimed. They are willing to distribute
these powers, however. in exchange for certain sets of concessions, all in the
pursuit of their grand designs for the world and their plots to overtake each
other. There were, at one point. at least seven primary Egregores. In the
immensity of their conflict, several were killed after the activation of the
Icarus Idols, leaving millions of potential powers available for the taking. by
human and Morphic alike. Those that survived are all the stronger for it. and
increasingly willing to distribute their powers in order to meet their endgame
of total control. It should be noted that the vast majority of Supers either do
not have an Egregore Patron. or more rarely do not know they have an
Egregore Patron.

Since these entities are in constant competition with one another. you may
not have more than one Egregore Patron. because they each possess
conflicting goals which their powers are attached to.

objects.title: The Crimson Emperor
objects.text:
The Icarus Entity is the Egregore of unblemished power and
inextinguishable will, the Juggernaut Steed. and the fist that seizes ‘round
its reigns. Those who seek power by its name must be dauntless.
unflinching, and sedulous without the slightest wavering. The goals of its
chosen are unimportant, so long as they are willing to do what must be
done to achieve them, no matter the cost. When you are aligned with these
principles wholeheartedly, it will hold you in great favor; when you betray
your ambition. when you flinch before the odds, or when you knowingly
harbor vulnerability. The Crimson Emperor will wane its powers away from
you. and only return their full power with a sufficient display of dedication
to its cause. Weaknesses, psychological or physical. must be expunged
without mercy if Icarus is to smile upon you.

objects.title: The Cobalt Monarch
objects.text:
The Daedalus Entity is the Egregore of the flawless logos, the supreme
knowledge, the Master of Secrets, and the lips that speak them perfectly.
The few who can approach it must be clear, cold. and calculated. The goals
of its chosen are unimportant, so long as they are pursued with flawless
reason and rationality. utterly frigid to the err of the flesh and the
deficiencies of the human intellect. When you are aligned with the principle
of emotionless, unerring pragmatism and calculate your every move with
precision. The Cobalt Monarch's countenance will find favor with you:
when you make human errors. ignore efficient routes to victory. or are
swept up in your physical or psychological needs. Tire Cobalt Monarch will
wane its powers away from you. and return their full power only with a
sufficient display of dedication to its cause. The calculative flaws of your
human nature make you frail: you must be rid of them entirely if
Daedalus's blessings are to be yours.

objects.title: The Ebony Prince
objects.text:
The Minos Entity is the Egregore of animal instinct, the cruel cycle of
nature. the Terror in the Diamond, and the natural selection we are
designed to fear. Those who approach it must be the despairing. the
paranoid. and the lonely. The goals of its chosen are unimportant. so long
as they are pursued out of anxiety. revenge. pain. and uncertainty. When
you are in touch with your animal nature. whether as a predator or as prey.
the Ebony Prince will look upon you with pleasure; when you experience
security. certainty about the future. or are unanxious about your fate. it
wanes its powers away from you. only returning them to full strength with
a sufficient display of dedication. We humans are bred for anxiety and
cruelty; fear of predation. of abuse. of loneliness. or the desire to inflict all
of these upon others to avoid them yourself, are simply a part of you. All
you have to do is give into that nature, and Minos will look with glee upon
you.

rows.title: Symbiotic Patrons
rows.titleText:
Symbiotic Patrons are usually low-level Morphic Entities, who are willing to
make concessions in exchange for establishing a symbiotic relationship,
usually but not always with regards to your powers. Morphic Entities in
general do not develop what we might consider “personality” or “character" in
a vacuum; they are, by and large. blank slates until they come into contact
with beings like humans who possess these traits. When they do, they are
intelligent enough to pick up on archetypes of behavior that procure net
benefits. In the symbiotic case, this usually lines up with the preferences of
their host. These traits aren’t merely learned behavior: they, with time, will
become the heartfelt beliefs and traits of the entity itself.

Depending on the type of Morph in question, they may have a host of
abilities unique to their kind, imbued by Egregore Entities in order to
facilitate symbiosis. These include, among other things, the capacity to
develop traits of personality as we do, the ability to project mass into a
physical body, the ability to understand and adapt to their host’s
preferences, and so forth. If such an entity requires your powers to sustain
itself or achieve its goals, it recognizes that you have total impunity
regarding how far your hospitality extends, and could feasibly sever their
connection to you if you ever became displeased with them, so they will aim
to guarantee this does not occur by providing you immense benefits and
conforming to your will with mind-bending loyalty. Since they can discern
your intent and preferences, they will never use these abilities in any way you
would deem inappropriate to this end. Regardless of eventual character
development, no Symbiotic Patron seems to be willing to break this principle
of host—first hierarchy, even to the most absurd degrees. Their every trait
and action is tailored directly to host preference, to a degree even the most
loyal of human beings couldn’t replicate.

objects.title: Fractal Morph
objects.text:
A Fractal Morph is a hive-collective of a pair, a dozen. a thousand, or even
millions or billions of low-level Morphic Entities which possess a set of
miniscule powers that synchronize with one another to create effects
greater than the sum of their parts. Whatever your power is. such a hive
mind seems to need it in order to achieve synchronisys, and so are willing
to extend immense benefits to you in exchange for symbiosis. Since
anomalies are non-exclusionary. you may both simultaneously use your
power as you need to, assuming your consent. Despite the enormous
number of powers they possess. they are individually miniscule, and even
their combined effect is marginal.

Even still. these effects are not insubstantial: as with all Symbiotic Patrons.
allowing a Morph to occupy your power drastically increases its mutation
potential. allowing it to grow into new and varied functions rather than
merely growing vertically. Similarly, each individual entity within the
hivemind is capable of projecting a material form. with a mass limited
roughly to that of a human being, though their relative fragility and power
weakness increases with greater numbers. making mass armies infeasible.
Similarly, you can offload your cognitive processes to this hivemind and
receive returns faster than the blink of an eye. Their collective calculative
processing speed is like that of a quantum supercomputer. drastically
enhancing your potential calculative intelligence and memory. Moreover,
they collectively act as a barrier to meta-power interference, rendering it

all but impossible to revoke or dampen your abilities, and can give extremely detailed information about the powers of others, unobscured by the effects
of things like the Low Frequency mutation.

objects.title: Knight Morph
objects.text:
The Knight Morph is a free-floating sub—spatial entity who feeds on excess
energies entrapped by the spin of your powers. It has found that the waste
energy produced by your abilities are an ideal source of sustenance. In
exchange, it will serve as a loyal protector and an extension of your
powers' range of effect. The Knight Morph will, over time. alter its
projected body from a largely amorphous humanoid to a perfect reflection
of your will for its shape. within reason (height. size. etc.). If you use your
powers, you may use them through your own body or through the Knight
Morph’s projection; touch—based abilities may flow from its fingertips. your
super strength may be fully wielded by its fists. and so on. Others can see
this entity as you utilize it, and it is tethered to your body within a limited
range that may expand with time. The Knight Morph will, like all Symbiotic
Patrons, develop a personality. language capacity, and intelligence over
time to suit your purposes for it. and similarly enhance the horizontal
mutation capabilities of your powers.

The Knight Morph, even without using durability or regeneration you
possess. is incredibly sturdy. and can act without your awareness to take
medium—impact blows on your behalf. or retaliate against threats you
aren't yet aware of. That durability will slowly develop over increased use.
increase proportionally. Moreover, it is capable of regenerating its own
body over time, even after complete destruction. through the power which
allows it to project a physical form in the first place. Unlike the Fractal and

Biodependent Morphs. Knight Morphs have extensive projection capabilities, and can even replicate complex biological systems like your own in order to
experience things like respiration, eating, and so on, though it doesn't necessarily have a need for these. Depending on your abilities, this Morph may be
an indispensable companion. an incredible utility. or a live—saving guardian.

objects.title: Biodependent Morph
objects.text:
Some Morphs, quite critically. lack the anomalous capacity to maintain
independent physical forms, and require a host body in order to maintain
homeostasis. In order to remain alive. it will consume harmless quantities
of your blood. In exchange. it will address and heal any wounds or
illnesses you possess to a degree modern medicine rarely can, and slowly
optimize your physique to levels achievable only with years of olympic
training. Similarly, it can use its physical body to protect the integrity of
yours by seeping through pores to form durable biomaterial shielding. As
will all Symbiotic Patrons, the Biodependent Morph drastically increases the
mutation potential of your powers, boosting their horizontal growth into
new functionalities. It's physical form. unlike other Morphs, is not merely
an anomalous projection. but a fully biological. cellular Iifeform, designed
and piloted by the Morph itself. As such, it can mimic nearly any biological
form desired by the user, so long as it has the biomass to do so. which it
may acquire through consumption of host fluids.

As the Biodependent Morph grows in body mass or is physically cut, it may
bud into multiple other Biodependent Morphs, who will naturally latch onto
you, but who may be distributed to others if you so desire. As the number
of Biodependent Morphs you possess grows exponentially. so too will their
benefits; their healing properties will slowly develop into regeneration,
their biomaterial shielding will become like industrial plating. and they will
bounce off of one another to more accurately develop personalities and

physical bodies according to your preferences. You could feasibly become the king or queen of a veritable hive of shapeshifting aliens, if you allow them to
develop exponentially.

rows.title: Power Mutations
rows.titleText:
The experiments which originally created powers in psychotronics subjects
came with a slew of mutations and abnormalities, most of which were
actively deadly to their users. Fortunately, in the modern day such mutations
have died out, leaving only beneficial mutations and enhancements for those
possessing powers, though their strength and variety are not uniformly
distributed. Non—player characters (i.e. Supers not made with this CYOA)
within the setting can only possess Mutation Tiers of a cost strictly less than
i. 0-cost Mutations are considered the default for most if not all Supers, and
Mutations are to be considered more rare the higher their cost. That is, if a
mutation costs .5 points, it is rarer overall than a mutation of cost .25, and
more common than one of cost .75. If not specified, you gain the benefits of
lower Tiers by purchasing at a higher Tier unless overridden by a higher Tier.
You may choose not to take any O—cost Mutations you see fit, such as is
required for the Vanilla Mutation.

objects.title: Concealed T1
objects.text:
If you should change
any significant aspect of your
appearance, people will be
naturally unable to discern a
connection between you and your
disguised persona. For instance.
wearing glasses or not wearing
them. using a small mask. donning
a hat, altering your hairstyle, or
wearing makeup would sufficiently

hide your identity even from people you know closely. If you do not make
these significant changes. it will be difficult. but not impossible. to
discern your identity. This effect may be toggled at will.

objects.title: Concealed T2
objects.text:
Regardless of whether you alter your appearance. people will
be unable to discern a connection between your secret identity and your
caped persona. This effect may be toggled at will.

objects.title: Noctis Cape T1
objects.text:
You require
drastically less sleep than a normal
person. usually about a single
night's worth per week. Your
circadian rhythm can be adjusted
just as your normal one can: you
may wish to space out your sleep
to a single hour per night. or
concentrate all of your sleep into a

normal night's rest and remain awake for days without any fatigue. You
may still sleep as you would normally. but will only feel the negative side
effects of sleep deprivation in extreme circumstances.

objects.title: Noctis Cape T2
objects.text:
You require absolutely no sleep whatsoever in order to
maintain full cognitive function. You can still be knocked unconscious,
drugged. or otherwise. but you do not feel a natural urge to sleep unless
you are injured or ill and would recover faster with bedrest. Your
escapades may now extend for days on end without any serious
consequence to your health. Similarly, your eyes are adapted perfectly to
the dark like those of a nocturnal animal. allowing you to see with total
clarity in such conditions.

objects.title: Morbidity Limit T1
objects.text:
Powers can have a
variety of extremely horrifying
effects on the internal physiology.
from the telekinetic who can
surgically crush your brain stem to
the fire manipulator who can boil
your very blood. While these
gruesome realities afflict common
men, those with superhuman

abilities have developed an adaptive mutation out of necessity and natural
selection. Your body cannot be targeted from the inside unless the
powers involved are designed to only operate on the human body. That is.
powers which specifically and solely create effects inside the body can
affect you. but powers which can act outside the body in any capacity
cannot so much as touch your internal physiology. They cannot attack
from the inside—out. though they can attack from the outside~in.

objects.title: Morbidity Limit T2
objects.text:
If you wish to inflict gorey death onto your fellow Super, this
Tier allows you to bypass the protection of Morbidity Limit: Tier 1. If you
possess this Tier, others possessing Morbidity Limit: Tier 2 cannot bypass
your protections. You may. with free impunity. crush the bones of your
foes from the inside, create force fields that slowly expand within arteries.
and so on. Sicko.

objects.title: Subtlety T1
objects.text:
Your powers are tied.
both in function and appearance.
to your personality and
subconscious, though they are not
perfectly aligned with your every
whim. You may choose the initial
appearance and visual flare of all
your abilities. but cannot change
these effects in post if you change
your mind.

objects.title: Subtlety T2
objects.text:
By default. all superpowers have some visual flare. whether
by shimmering into invisibility. or creating a brief flash when you teleport.
These effects may no longer occur if you wish. allowing you to use your
abilities with more subtlety, such as by teleporting with no puff of smoke
or distortion of space. or flying at high speeds without creating sound.
Not only may you alter the visual effects your powers create for subtlety,
but also for cosmetic value: you may freely alter the color of your optic
beams. create trails of light when flying. disintegrate and reintegrate into
multicolored cubes when you teleport. or any other desired nonfunctional
effect. This ability may be toggled at will.

objects.title: Core Instinct T1
objects.text:
The vast majority of
powers require direct intent to
operate. In the light-speed heat of
superhuman conflict. human
reaction time is a veritable
eternity. Your powers can now
activate any of their effects as an
instantaneous reflex. if you would
have wanted your powers to
activate any effect. but did not or

could not do so yourself. they will activate of their own accord as if you
did. instantaneously and independent of your cognitive speed. reaction
time, or otherwise. This effect isn't merely useful in the heat of battle:
depending on your powers. you may otherwise forget to shapeshift back
into human form, or toggle your intangibility, or release your ironclad
mind control on a handful of bystanders. With this ability. such
circumstances are no longer a problem.

objects.title: Core Instinct T2
objects.text:
Your powers may now activate any of their effects under the
principle above even without your direct awareness. acting on full
autopilot if need be. This includes even when unconscious or during the
effects of mind control. if it should be necessary. However, it should be
noted that your powers may only act upon circumstances within your
immediately relevant surroundings: they are adept at avoiding danger, but
cannot act upon psycho-remote stimulus. lf even some small, otherwise
unnoticeable part of you could detect a circumstance. such as through
subtle hearing or scent. your powers may act on them as if you did.

objects.title: Set Architect T1
objects.text:
You have an unusually
high potential for a multitude of
Aberrant abilities. resulting in a
mixed—bag of immense feat
variety at your disposal. After your
Primary Power in the Aberrants
section, your Secondary Power's
cost is its Magnitude divided by
three rather than two. Likewise,
your Tertiary Power's cost is its

Magnitude divided by four, and so on. This gives a much greater potential
for varied power sets centered around multiple equal or semi-equal
abilities, rather than one overwhelming Primary Power and smaller
supplementary powers.

objects.title: Set Architect T2
objects.text:
Your potential for Aberrant abilities is truly astounding, and
you have a drastically enhanced potential to develop multiple coequal
powers in enormous variety. After your Primary Power in the Aberrants
section. your Secondary Power's cost is its Magnitude divided by four
rather than two. Likewise, your Tertiary Power's cost is its Magnitude
divided by five. and so on. With this mutation. your potential to develop
high-level powersets and a multitude of sub-abilities is truly astonishing,
and conceivably viable at even the highest levels in the superhuman
world.

objects.title: Power Lock T1
objects.text:
While there are very
rare powers which can manipulate
and even take powers. powers
return to their user the same way a
cut blossom will bloom again with
time. As is the case with all
Supers. if your powers are ever
taken. dampened, or otherwise
negatively altered. they will return

to their original state with time. This may be a long, arduous time. but
negative changes will be temporary nonetheless. and never untenably
long (Le. years. decades or lifetimes).

objects.title: Power Lock T2
objects.text:
Your powers may still be dampened. manipulated. taken. or
otherwise negatively altered, but will return to you before the event of
your death can occur. no matter what circumstances may apply. If your
intangibility is taken and a bullet is fired at you, it will return before the
bullet collides with you. If your super strength is taken while holding up a
building full of civilians, it will return to you before you are crushed by the
weight.

objects.title: Power Lock T3
objects.text:
Your powers are inviolable, and the only way to revoke them is
to end your life. Thus. they cannot be altered by any meta-manipulative
abilities or effects directly. for better or for worse. While your abilities may
or may not be like Paragon Aberrants in sheer strength. they are like them
in their total inviolability. Your abilities may even be Paragon Aberrants
which have been clipped of their proverbial wings. limited in the process
of transferring them from a Morphic Entity to a human wielder.

objects.title: Airbrush T1
objects.text:
By anyone's metric.
you're a ten-out-of—ten physique,
with rippling muscles or smooth
curves to suit your personal ideal
of beauty. As a side—effect. any
genetic illnesses or afflictions you
may possess are permanently
removed. What constitutes this
alteration is up to your

interpretation of an ideal body. Supers are infamous for being
unattainably attractive. putting to shame normal everyday people. Now
you are on the other side of that coin.

objects.title: Airbrush T2
objects.text:
You gain all of the above effects. cranked up to the llth
degree. You are sweeter eye-candy than any unpowered person could
ever hope to be, likened unto idealistic depictions in art and salacious
fantasy. The unpalatable realities of human biology (unpleasant odors,
unwanted hair. waste. blemishes. etc.) no longer apply to you. Minor
genetic traits (hair and eye color, vocal range. height, etc.) may be altered
according to your preference so long as they are genetically possible in
baseline humans.

objects.title: Airbrush T3
objects.text:
Without exaggeration. you are as gorgeous as the physical
body will allow. Your body is exactly reflective of your ideal selfwhile still
conforming to phenotype limits within your species. You may alter your
race, gender, age, height, weight and any other physical features to your
preference. limited only by what could occur naturally in a member of
your species. You may treat this like a one-time. species-limited
shapeshift. Unless other circumstances apply. you will still age normally
within your chosen phenotypes. That said, you will age like fine wine.
never becoming less attractive as a result of your years.

objects.title: Eternal T1
objects.text:
For a certain period.
your aging will be completely
halted. enhancing your lifespan
considerably and allowing you to
live in your prime condition much
longer than naturally possible.
Choose any age you will live to
become. You will remain at this
age physically for any number of

years between twenty and eighty that you choose, suffering no adverse
health effects that would be unusual for that physical age (dementia.
memory loss) during that period. After this period is over. you will begin
to age normally again. Your mind is refined so that your memories do not
grow any less clear beyond ten years since when those memories were
acquired. You may suspend the effects of this mutation at any time you
deem appropriate

objects.title: Eternal T2
objects.text:
You age dramatically slower beyond a certain physical
threshold. Choose any age within a typical human lifespan. After this
chosen point. you will age one year physically over the next ten years.
After this. you will age one year physically over the next twenty years.
then thirty years. then fourty years. and so on. Only health conditions that
you can recover from may ever affect you. meaning terminal illness like
cancer, alzheimers. dementia. or general degradation due to old age will
not affect you. If you do not die of unnatural causes. you could feasibly
live to be thousands of years old. In the general population of Supers
possessing this mutation. their starting age is essentially random. but is
never within a decade of natural death. For reference, if you were to begin
this process at age twenty. you would be five hundred years old before
you looked thirty, and be over two thousand before you looked forty. Your
mind is refined as described in Eternal: Tier I. You may suspend the
effects of this mutation at any time you deem appropropriate.

objects.title: Eternal T3
objects.text:
You have the potential to live for hundreds of millions of
years. or even longer. Choose any age within a typical human lifespan.
After this chosen point. you will age one year physically over the next ten
years. Then. you will age one year physically over the next twenty years.
then fourty years. then eighty years. then one-hundred-sixty years. and
so on. For reference, if you were to begin this process at age twenty, you
would be over ten thousand by the time you looked thirty. and almost
twenty-one million by the time you looked forty. You possess all the
additional benefits and protections described in Eternal: Tier I and Tier 2.
Your body cannot ever grow more unhealthy, though it can grow more
healthy. eventually resulting in a state of glowing and ideal health. You
may suspend the effects of this mutation at any time you deem
appropriate.

objects.title: Mental Blocks T1
objects.text:
While mental abilities
such as telepathy. possession.
illusions. or mind control can be
devastating. anti-superhuman
counterinsurgents have developed
effective measures against mental
attacks. You are aware of when an
attempt is being made to influence
your mind. and can counter the

influence by concentrating and avoiding complex thought of any kind. For
most people. this is extremely difficult. but you have either self-trained or
obtained training in the blockage of basic psychic influence. Attempting
to resist high—level psychic attacks using these unspecialized techniques
can cause bleeding of the nose and eyes. and will usually result in a
failure of concentration. or even brain trauma if resistance is continued
extensively. If you yourself possess powers of mental manipulation.
knowledge of these techniques allows you knowledge of their weak
points. meaning you may surpass the protections of Mental Blocks: Tier 1
if you can overcome the will of your victim. You may allow the influences
of a psychic if you so desire. You do not need to possess powers to learn
this ability. and many secret operatives. conspiracy theorists. and police
forces have.

objects.title: Mental Blocks T2
objects.text:
You've learned anti—telepathy techniques used by intelligence
operatives and spies. for whom confidentiality is considered an
imperative. who employ specialized techniques for every situation. While
this requires a multitude of techniques for a multitude of possible angles
of attack. you have mastered all of them to degrees only the most unusual
methods could break. If you yourself possess powers of mental
manipulation. knowledge of these techniques allows you knowledge of
their weak points. meaning you may surpass the protections of Mental
Blocks: Tier 2 if you can overcome the will of your victim. You may allow
the influences of a psychic if you so desire. You do not need to possess
powers to learn this ability. and many secret operatives. conspiracy
theorists. and police forces have.

objects.title: Mental Blocks T3
objects.text:
You have a talent for anti-telepathy techniques which are the
envy of every intelligence organization the world over. You’ve discovered
a truly flawless method of blocking telepathic attacks. and it is impossible
for you to be mind controlled. telepathically read. possessed. or otherwise
mentally manipulated. Those that attempt to manipulate your mind.
regardless of their psychic prowess. will be assaulted with heavy
migraines and bleeding at the nose. with continued attempts at your mind
resulting in concussions and even aneurysms. You may allow the
influences of a psychic if you so desire. Your willpower against such
attacks is absolutely unwavering. If you yourself are a psychic. you may
penetrate these protections if you can overwhelm the will of your target.

objects.title: Flashpoint T1
objects.text:
Some
superpowers have latent potential
which may only be unlocked
through a second power
awakening. called an S-Flash. Your
powers are such an example. and
you are capable of a Secondary
Flash event to drastically evolve
your abilities. Create a second set

of powers. with +2 to your total point pool. If you should ever experience
a Flash, your powers will mutate into this new S-Flash set. whether this
set is simply an upgrade to your old powers or a completely new suite of
abilities which overwrite your previous ones. You can feel untapped power
welling within you like a held breath. If you have Hypermutation: Tier I or
higher in your current and S-Flash sets. take +3 instead. You pay this
mutation's initial cost in your original set. You cannot change your choice
of Egregore Patron. Listing or any expenditure of Resource Points between
these sets. Your S—Flash will occur once you surpass a certain threshold of
power above your base abilities. which is random but not unreasonable.
You may not take the Flashpoint mutation in your S-Flash set.

objects.title: Flashpoint T2
objects.text:
Your locked potential is far greater than even the
most gifted superhumans. When creating your S—Flash set of powers. add
+3 to your total point pool. The likelihood that you will actually
experience another Flash is drastically increased. and you feel as if there
is a bursting gush of unimaginable power awaiting just beneath your
fingertips. If you have Hypermutation: Tier 2 or higher in your current and
S-Flash sets. take +5 instead. You pay this mutation's initial cost in your
original set. You cannot change your choice of Egregore Patron. Listing or
any expenditure of Resource Points between these sets. Your S-Flash will
occur once you surpass a certain threshold of power which is random but
perfectly achievable given effort and training. You may not take the
Flashpoint mutation in your S-Flash set.

objects.title: Flashpoint T3
objects.text:
Power is gushing beneath the surface. reaching
ever closer to a boiling point you know will change everything. You have
an additional +5 points to help you build your S-Flash set. Depending on
how you optimize your sets. your evolved powers may be an utterly
perfected version of your previous ones. or a completely unrecognizable
array of new abilities. If you have Hypermutation: Tier 3 or higher in your
current and S—Flash sets. take +8 to use in your S-Flash set. You pay this
mutation's initial cost in your original set. You cannot change your choice
of Egregore Patron. Listing or any expenditure of Resource Points between
these sets. Your S-Flash will occur when you surpass a certain threshold
of power above your base abilities. This threshold is perfectly achievable
given time. and may be reached at an accelerated pace through effort and
training. You may not take the Flashpoint mutation in your S-Flash set.

objects.title: Hypermutation T1
objects.text:
All powers grow in
strength logarithmically. making
great bounds of progress initially
before petering out at a relative
maximum and remaining relatively
stagnant. save for the case of
another Flash. With this mutation.
your powers now grow linearly.
never reaching a relative maximum

with time. If you hypothetically lived forever. you would continue to grow
in strength for multiple lifetimes before reaching the top of Magnitude
18's range. Additionally. this mutation exponentially amplifies the effects
of Flashpoint mutations. though you must still pay this mutation's cost in
your post—Flash sets to receive these benefits. Unless you already have a
Paragon Aberrant. your powers cannot develop into Magnitudes beyond
18. though this is hardly an issue given how maddeningly high this upper
limit is.

objects.title: Hypermutation T2
objects.text:
Not only do your powers have no hard maxima on their
magnitude. but also on their domain. Your powers can mutate in function
with time. while still keeping with their core idea: your optic beams may
develop the ability to fork around corners. your invisibility may also
develop inaudibility or even intangibility. and so forth. These new
functionalities will always develop to complement your style of combat
and strategy. and will always serve as a net benefit to your overall
performance. This mutation exponentially amplifies the effects of
Flashpoint mutations. though you must still pay this mutation's cost in
your post-Flash sets to receive these benefits. Unless you already have a
Paragon Aberrant. your powers cannot develop into Magnitudes beyond
18. though this is hardly an issue given how maddeningly high this upper
limit is.

objects.title: Hypermutation T3
objects.text:
You retain all of the above effects. Your growth is now
proportional to how powerful your abilities are. with growth improving
power improving growth. causing your abilities to explosively improve as
a recursive loop. It is truly absurd how quickly this mutation can skyrocket
your powers. especially so if you are already quite strong to begin with.
Double your powers' proficiency and you will see your rate of growth
double too. Double your powers' proficiency again in half the time. and
you will see your rate of growth quadrupled. and so forth. Unless you
already have a Paragon Aberrant. your powers cannot develop into
Magnitudes beyond 18. though this is hardly an issue given how
maddeningly high this upper limit is.

objects.title: Hypermutation T4
objects.text:
You retain all of the above effects. Your powers have the
capacity to crystallize into a Paragon Aberrant. given extreme time and
exponential growth. meaning there is feasibly no limit to how powerful
you could eventually become. Type abilities will crystallize uniformly.
incorporating all of the abilities you possess within your domain into the
Paragon Aberrant that results if you surpass Magnitude 18. Note.
however. that the Magnitude of such abilities is absurd to the highest
degree. The most powerful superhuman to ever live was a Magnitude 15.
and even the most revered Supers in the world rarely surpass Magnitude
12.

objects.title: Power Sense T1
objects.text:
When Supers use
their powers. they release an
anomalous waveform which can be
detected by other Supers. allowing
Supers within their proximity to
detect the magnitude of abilities
they've used. When within
reasonable distance of another
Super (about sight-range if there

were no walls). if they use their powers you can tell the magnitude of the
power they just exerted and. in general. where these powers were used.
Notably. you cannot tell if another Super is holding back. and you can only
judge how powerful they are by what you've sensed them do so far.

objects.title: Power Sense T2
objects.text:
Along with the above. you can sense when a Super is holding
back. though you cannot discern how much they are withholding.
Moreover. you can tell what Type they are if they use a Type ability while
near you. and sense if it is an Aberrant if not a Type. Finally. you can tell
not only when a power is used in your proximity. but when a power is
about to be used. If another Super has the Low Frequency: Tier 1
Mutation. you can sense them as if you were using Power Sense: Tier 1.
Similarly. you may use detection powers such as precognition. remote
viewing. and so on against those with Low Frequency: Tier 1.

objects.title: Power Sense T3
objects.text:
You can sense Supers within your proximity whether or not
they have recently used their powers. and can sense exactly how powerful
they are. Similarly. when you sense a Super. you become aware of exactly
what their powers are capable of. down to their minute details. You can
also sense what Mutations they possess. If another Super has the Low
Frequency: Tier 1 Mutation. you can supersede their protections. If
another Super has the Low Frequency: Tier 2 Mutation. you can sense
them as if you were using Power Sense: Tier 2.

objects.title: Low Frequency T1
objects.text:
When you use your
powers. you naturally emit an
anomalous waveform which can be
detected by other Supers. who can
also tell how powerful the feat you
just performed was. You are now
immune to detection via Power
Sense: Tier 1 or any other form of
detection. such as technology.

blood tests. or otherwise. Moreover. any other information powers which
attempt to discover you or your activities will fail. such as precognitive
abilities. remote viewing. and so on.

objects.title: Low Frequency T2
objects.text:
You are now immune to detection via Power Sense: Tier 1 and
Tier 2. If you are detected by another person who supersedes these
boundaries, you become aware of the fact that you are detected. and any
information which they know about you. you are also given about them.
such as their relative strength. the kinds of powers they have. and so on.
You may allow yourself to be detected via Power Sense: Tier 1 and Tier 2 if
you so desire to receive this information.

objects.title: Low Frequency T3
objects.text:
You are immune to detection via Power Sense: Tier 1. Tier 2.
and Tier 3. If you allow yourself to be detected by another through these
abilities. you become aware of the fact that you are detected. and any
information which they seek out about you. you are also given about
them. You are given information concerning them before they
comprehend any information about you. You have the ability to
camouflage your own waveform. making others believe you are stronger
or weaker than you are. that you have completely different powers. that
you have weaknesses you don't actually possess. and more. so long as
they would have been able to detect the information you're falsifying. This
ability also works for the purposes of blood tests. technological power
tests. and so forth.

objects.title: Polytype T1
objects.text:
Most Supers. if they
possess a Type at all. can only
possess one. This is because.
practically speaking. Types exist
due to similarities between powers
passed from parent to child and
genetic drift. Any one Type is so
vastly different from any other that
the commonalities between them

are few and far between. This mutation. however. allows you to possess
powers in two different Types. should you desire them. Moreover. your
skill at wielding both of them is not diminished by the spread of their
functionalities. and possessing multiple types creates exponential synergy
between the two unavailable to a normal unmutated user.

Once you have purchased a Tier (1. 2. or 3) in a Type of your choice. you
obtain that Tier in all other Types simultaneously for free.

objects.title: Polytype T2
objects.text:
Rather than only being capable of two different Types. you
are capable of a maximum of four. With the sheer number of Types
feasibly at your disposal. their synergistic combinations can provide
immense benefit to one another across multiple relationships: Type Green
may aid in the shaping of anomalous energies via Type Violet. Type Black
may provide you with movement and lethality which immensely benefit
the hand—to—hand style of Type Red. and the entranced intellect of Type
Blue may further enhance the already considerable skills one may acquire
through Type Grey.

Once you have purchased a Tier (1. 2. or 3) in a Type of your choice. you
obtain that Tier in all other Types simultaneously for free.

objects.title: Polytype T3
objects.text:
You are feasibly capable of using abilities from all eight
primary Types. if you can afford the costs of powers within them.
However. you are by no means limited to these nongenetic Types. and
have the potential to develop abilities within genetically exclusive
domains. or even domains that don't yet exist. You may design your own
Type(s). creating Aberrant abilities with a Magnitude no greater than 4
and no less than 1 for Tier 1. no greater than 9 and no less than 5 for Tier
2. no greater than 12 and no less than 9 for Tier 3. The costs of these
powers will simply be their Magnitude. Just like Types. for every power
you possess in an upper Tier. you acquire a power in its lower Tier for
free. stacking downward. You may design a pinnacle ability of Magnitude
16 with a cost of 14 points. requiring that you possess Tier 3 within your
own Type to acquire it. Like all Types. the ability to buy powers costs 1
point for Tier 1. 2 for Tier 2. and 4 for Tier 3. If you design a Type in this
way. others with this mutation may purchase powers within it as you
describe them. If another designs a Type in this way. you may purchase
powers within it as they describe them. Types of this kind should be
named after the elements of the periodic table or after their first user.
depending on preference.

Once you have purchased a Tier (I. 2. or 3) in a Type of your choice. you
obtain that Tier in all other Types simultaneously for free. except for
Types you create yourself.

objects.title: Natural Harmony T1
objects.text:
When one attains their
powers. their abilities naturally
adapt around their psyche and
personality to operate at their best
functionality. given the constraints
of the human mind. in doing so.
you instinctively know how to use
your powers and their functions.
and your powers will avoid

incidentally harming you in the same way your mind prevents you from
biting off your finger even though yourjaw is strong enough.

objects.title: Natural Harmony T2
objects.text:
Your powers control far easier than they would normally. You
will never have any trouble pushing your powers to their absolute
maximum, nor will distraction. emotion. or exhaustion ever affect their or
your own performance. Your powers will actively avoid incidentally
harming yourself or others if you wouldn't wish to harm them. Unlike
most. you have an encyclopedic knowledge of your power's limitations
and the extent of their functions. making creative exercise of your powers
much more readily available and increasing your tactical options.

objects.title: Natural Harmony T3
objects.text:
Your powers now move with the ease of a blink and swell with
the effort of a breath. It is impossible for you to become exhausted by
overuse of your powers. and you possess feasibly infinite stamina as far
as your abilities are concerned. Your ability to use your powers is utterly
ruthless. and you possess knowledge of every minute detail of your
powers down to their slightest nuance. including how they may have been
used in the past by a prior possessor. if this applies. You feel as if you
and your powers were made with one another in mind. and it is by destiny
that you have come to possess them.

objects.title: Adaptability T1
objects.text:
Your powers have
drastically enhanced horizontal
growth potential. Where most can
only grow in scale. your abilities
will also grow in versatility over
time. giving new beneficial
functions to your existing powers
and expanding on the existing
material you possess.
Furthermore. if you have multiple

distinct powers. you will develop powers that merge them together. such
as merging flight and super strength into body force manipulation. or
enhanced intelligence and mindreading to enhanced comprehension to
easily gather swaths of information. This mutation stacks multiplicatively
with the effects of Hypermutation: Tier 2 and any Symbiotic Patron. the
rough equivalent of either on their own.

objects.title: Adaptability T2
objects.text:
Your powers have such a phenomenal degree of adaptability
that their overarching functions and themes may change over time if need
be. often with drastic changes to enhance your style of combat. If super
strength is insufficient. you will begin to develop body force manipulation.
then force manipulation. then telekinesis. and so on. If your optic beams
don‘t provide enough defensive utility, they can evolve from energy blasts
to energy projections. then energy constructs. then energy armor. and so
on. This mutation stacks multiplicatively with the effects of
Hypermutation: Tier 2 and any Symbiotic Patron. the rough equivalent of
both together in sheer mutation potential.

objects.title: Vanilla T1
objects.text:
You may only choose this option if
you do not possess any other
mutations. even those of O-cost.
Tier 1 (+2): You do not possess
any of the protections of Morbidity
Limit. but you may surpass the
protections of Morbidity Limit: Tier
1 in others. If others have the
Power Sense Mutation at any level.
they can sense that you are

vulnerable against internal attacks. That said. everyone who has only
Morbidity Limit: Tier 1 and not Tier 2 is vulnerable to your internal
attacks. If anyone removes your powers permanently. they will also lose
their powers permanently. regardless of the effects of Power Lock. Those
with powers that could do such a thing are made aware of this fact when
in your proximity.

objects.title: Vanilla T2
objects.text:
You are utterly vulnerable with regards to psychic attacks.
power removal or alteration. and internal remote attack. You are without
mutations of any kind. even those providing offensive countermeasures
such as those detailed in Vanilla: Tier 1. That said. your powers have
prioritized sheer magnitude and variety over any number of small vital
enhancements. granting you much greater potential for truly absurd
abilities.

objects.title: Grab Bag T1
objects.text: Choose two of the following beneficial effects from Grab Bag: Tier 1:

objects.title: Grab Bag T2
objects.text: Choose any three of the beneficial effects from Grab Bag: Tier 1 and Tier 2:

objects.title: Grab Bag T3
objects.text: Choose any five of the beneficial effects from Grab Bag: Tier 1. Tier 2. and Tier 3:

objects.title: Polysapien
objects.text:
Describe an alternate body for yourself, its features limited to any possible phenotypes for your species. You may change from your usual
body to your alternate body and vice—versa at will. These bodies age separately, and both have the benefits of any mutations and powers you possess. You
may choose this effect multiple times and design a separate body you can shift to for each time you do so.

objects.title: Multipersonality
objects.text:
Decide on a set of character traits, personality archetypes, likes and dislikes, beliefs, et cetera. You are able to switch between your
usual personality and this described one and vice-versa at will. You will retain your memories between these two personalities. If you have the Polysapien
effect, you may attach this personality to an alternate body so that your described character traits immediately come into effect and will remain in effect
while you are in an alternate body. You may choose this effect multiple times and design a separate personality which you can shift to for each time you do
so.

objects.title: lron Mind
objects.text:
You are cool-headed to the nth degree. Your emotions never get in the way, you never become anxious to the point of making mistakes, and
you are permanently immune to any and all mental health issues. Any you possess when you acquire your powers are removed. Stressful circumstances,
extreme danger, and even the effects of time on an unnatural lifespan will all have no degrading effect on your wellbeing, even if sustained for long
periods. Moreover, your rational capacity for strategy, quick—thinking, and adaptability are dramatically improved, beyond what a human mind might be
capable of in all of these departments. What would traumatize others falls off your back like water.

objects.title: Aura
objects.text:
You have an aura which invokes a specific feeling in all those around you. This aura’s actual effect is purely subconscious: if you want to inspire
fear on a subconscious level, your aura will invoke terror; if you wish to be a center of romantic attention, your aura will invoke these feelings in others; if
you want to inspire hope, love, and peace, so too will this follow. You may consciously control this aura if you so desire.

objects.title: Polysapien
objects.text:
Describe an alternate body for yourself, its features limited to any possible phenotypes for your species. You may change from your usual
body to your alternate body and vice—versa at will. These bodies age separately, and both have the benefits of any mutations and powers you possess. You
may choose this effect multiple times and design a separate body you can shift to for each time you do so.

objects.title: Multipersonality
objects.text:
Decide on a set of character traits, personality archetypes, likes and dislikes, beliefs, et cetera. You are able to switch between your
usual personality and this described one and vice-versa at will. You will retain your memories between these two personalities. If you have the Polysapien
effect, you may attach this personality to an alternate body so that your described character traits immediately come into effect and will remain in effect
while you are in an alternate body. You may choose this effect multiple times and design a separate personality which you can shift to for each time you do
so.

objects.title: lron Mind
objects.text:
You are cool-headed to the nth degree. Your emotions never get in the way, you never become anxious to the point of making mistakes, and
you are permanently immune to any and all mental health issues. Any you possess when you acquire your powers are removed. Stressful circumstances,
extreme danger, and even the effects of time on an unnatural lifespan will all have no degrading effect on your wellbeing, even if sustained for long
periods. Moreover, your rational capacity for strategy, quick—thinking, and adaptability are dramatically improved, beyond what a human mind might be
capable of in all of these departments. What would traumatize others falls off your back like water.

objects.title: Aura
objects.text:
You have an aura which invokes a specific feeling in all those around you. This aura’s actual effect is purely subconscious: if you want to inspire
fear on a subconscious level, your aura will invoke terror; if you wish to be a center of romantic attention, your aura will invoke these feelings in others; if
you want to inspire hope, love, and peace, so too will this follow. You may consciously control this aura if you so desire.

objects.title: Masochist
objects.text:
When you endure physical harm or exhaustion and subsequently recover, your powers gain a significant boost in growth for a temporary
interval. The boost itself is proportional to the exhaustion or harm you endured, while its duration is proportional to how long it took you to recover. The
harm which this power describes cannot be self-inflicted, and bodily injury grants exceptionally more growth than exhaustion, though for some bodily
harm may be quite literally impossible.

objects.title: Worthy Opponents
objects.text:
Something about your powers naturally attracts those who would be challenging opponents, and they will similarly be attracted to
you. Furthermore, you repel opponents who would be too weak for an interesting engagement, and those who are absurdly out of your league will be
repelled by you. Overall, this means your encounters with other Supers are on a bell curve, with absurdly weak and absurdly strong Supers avoiding you,
and those roughly within your skill range or your team’s skill range will be much more common than the alternative.

objects.title: Painkiller
objects.text:
You don’t experience physical pain in the way an average person might. Rather than being indicated by an extreme sensation of discomfort,
pain is indicated to you by a light, undistracting fizzing sensation in the area, allowing you to operate at full capacity completely unabated by even the
more dire injuries. A different sensation, like an itch, occurs if what you are doing will exacerbate an existing injury. All of this combined allows you to
experience and respond to pain rationally while still keeping your priorities and survival in mind. That, and it allows you to endure things most men have
nightmares about and take it like a true ironman.

objects.title: Linguist
objects.text:
You know every language that is currently spoken on Earth with the fluency and articulation of a masterful native speaker. You may acquire
similar knowledge of any language not included in this array via contact between yours and a native speaker’s linguistic organ; for instance, you could
learn sign language or braille by touching the hand of someone who does, or any oral language through lip contact, et cetera. This can apply to languages
the human body isn’t even equipped to properly replicate. We don’t have gas valves, chittering carapaces, and so on, but this mutation allows you to
effectively replicate all of these with your mouth if need be.

objects.title: Polysapien
objects.text:
Describe an alternate body for yourself, its features limited to any possible phenotypes for your species. You may change from your usual
body to your alternate body and vice—versa at will. These bodies age separately, and both have the benefits of any mutations and powers you possess. You
may choose this effect multiple times and design a separate body you can shift to for each time you do so.

objects.title: Multipersonality
objects.text:
Decide on a set of character traits, personality archetypes, likes and dislikes, beliefs, et cetera. You are able to switch between your
usual personality and this described one and vice-versa at will. You will retain your memories between these two personalities. If you have the Polysapien
effect, you may attach this personality to an alternate body so that your described character traits immediately come into effect and will remain in effect
while you are in an alternate body. You may choose this effect multiple times and design a separate personality which you can shift to for each time you do
so.

objects.text:

you are permanently immune to any and all mental health issues. Any you possess when you acquire your powers are removed. Stressful circumstances,
extreme danger, and even the effects of time on an unnatural lifespan will all have no degrading effect on your wellbeing, even if sustained for long
periods. Moreover, your rational capacity for strategy, quick—thinking, and adaptability are dramatically improved, beyond what a human mind might be
capable of in all of these departments. What would traumatize others falls off your back like water.

objects.text:

objects.text:

objects.text:
You know every language that is currently spoken on Earth with the fluency and articulation of a masterful native speaker. You may acquire

learn sign language or braille by touching the hand of someone who does, or any oral language through lip contact, et cetera. This can apply to languages
the human body isn’t even equipped to properly replicate. We don’t have gas valves, chittering carapaces, and so on, but this mutation allows you to
effectively replicate all of these with your mouth if need be.

objects.title: Phoenix
objects.text:
You have a degree of protection against undeserving, grim demise. You may activate the effects of this power if you suffer an unnatural death
which is not "deserved" (such as walking into danger knowingly, as punishment for your evil actions, or to protect others from you), which was not
“enviable" (such as surrounded by loved ones after a life well lived, a death for which you will be remembered as a hero, etc) and which was not a
“Checkmate" (in which you were thoroughly outdone strategically, physically, or circumstantially in some way you could have feasibly prevented or
avoided). In such a case, a period between one year and five years will pass, and after this time, you will be resurrected in a reasonable location near where
you died. This ability cannot activate again for a period of one—hundred divided by the number of years before your resurrection (practically, between
twenty and one-hundred years, but you may know exactly by measuring the date after you died). This waiting period can be reduced to zero years by
killing another person who has this ability in such circumstances as to activate its effects in them, in a Highlander-esque immortality scheme.

objects.title: Pandemic
objects.text:
You may give anyone any mutation you possess, including this one, so long as it is of a cost less than or equal to l or comes from the Grab
Bag mutation. This may be done even to people who don’t have powers themselves, though some mutations only have effects on powers in the first place.
Any decision made by the buyer (such as one’s ideal form, an age to begin decelerating the aging process, etc) can be made by you on behalf of the
person you give the mutation to, or you may allow them to make these decisions themselves. You may similarly revoke any mutation given to others
through this ability, whether by you or otherwise. While you can make decisions about the mutations on behalf of those you give them to, you cannot force
mutations onto others; they must accept what you give to them, and they are made aware of what this entails. Again, note that this mutation cannot be
used to give any mutation of a cost greater than 1 unless it comes from the Grab Bag mutation, and it must be a mutation you yourself possess. If you
have a mutation at a Tier which costs more than 1 point, but Tiers exist below it that cost less than 1 point, you can grant these lower Tiers.

objects.title: Cutless
objects.text:
All the functions of your vital organs are offloaded to your powers. Your blood pumps, your mind thinks, your lungs breathe independently of
one another, making all but traumatic brain injury unable to kill you, though it could seriously maim you. Moreover, since all of these functions are
performed by your powers and not your body, you can feasibly micromanage every endocrine, neural, and cardiovascular function in your body at any
given time. All of these coalesce into a generic endurance to damage, by which you are able to take some truly absurd beatings before you are killed. As
long as your brain is mostly intact, and you are not killed by the effects of aging or otherwise, you will remain alive, and you can manually control all of
your bodily functions. You can even micromanage your immune response to avoid death by toxins, pathogens, and so on.

objects.title: Vacuum—Adapted
objects.text:
Your physical body is given a suite of subtle adaptations to survive in the vacuum of space, strange planets, and other such extreme
conditions, as if your species had evolved with this possibility in mind. Your bodily orifices, including your eyes, nose, throat, and so on, have transparent
membrane—like seals that protect your body from toxic atmospheres, poisonous seas, or space. When you are wounded, your blood clots instantly for the
same reason. Moreover, your skin has an extremely thin subdermal layer of perfect-insulation, meaning you cannot overheat or become cold on other
worlds or in space. You no longer possess a need for oxygen to survive. Your pores open and generate chemical energy to sustain you from any gaseous
or liquid particles, and such sustenance can last you for months with only micrograms of material. Your body naturally does this when gas or liquid is
available around you. The density of your bones and tissues dynamically increase or decrease to accommodate for gravity, meaning that you wouldn’t
notice the difference between the surface ofJupiter and the moon in terms of gravitation, and you may adjust this to feel harsh gravitation if you so desire.
You are totally immune to the effects of high radiation, solar winds, and the like, allowing you to survive for months or even years without stopping,
soaring through the cosmos unabated.

rows.title: Powers
rows.titleText:
*Before you may purchase powers in a Type's Tiers. you must purchase access to that Tier. These costs are specified below each Tier.
”You may only obtain one Type unless you have chosen the Polytype Mutation. if you do have the Polytype Mutation. purchasing access to a Tier in one
Type grants that same Tier in all Types. and you may choose powers within the number of Types permitted by your Polytype Mutation.
"Type powers are organized into 3 Tiers and 3 Pinnacle Ability. Purchasing the Pinnacle Ability gives you one power of your choice in each Tier for free.
These powers may be a Custom Slot.
‘When you purchase a power in any Tier. you acquire one power of your choice in each lower Tier for free. These powers may be a Custom Slot.

objects.title: Types
objects.text:
Types are power domains. That is. one who has a certain Type may feasibly
learn any or all abilities within the domain of powers that Type represents.
given time and training. Not all Supers have a Type. and not all Supers have
just one Type. but most Supers who are born with their abilities have one
Type.

Types are the result of commonalities created by powers passed along
genetic lines. giving offspring the potential to acquire any powers their
predecessors might have had. if those powers were similar in essence or
effect. Thus. people who were born Supers are much more likely to have
Types and/or a variation of their parents' Aberrant powers. while people who
attained a natural Flash are much more likely to have solely Aberrant powers
and occasionally may possess Types due to genetic drift.

Note that Types are by no means limited to the powers described here:
Custom Powers exist within each Type for you to create. and you may add
even more Type powers to your arsenal with the ‘Augment Existing Type’
option in a later section. so long as the powers you're adding fit the Type
thematically. Within the setting. users of a Type may have a multitude of
different abilities not mentioned here that still fit the domain of their Type.
such as obscure forms of strength and durability for Type Red. extremely
specialized forms of energy manipulation among Type Violet users. and
more. These should serve as examples. and in no way reflect the boundaries
of what a Type can do.

Pinnacle Abilities represent the hypothetical ‘Tier 4' of Types. which grant to
their user a suite of powers which reveal what a Type are truly capable of. If
there is room for improvement within these abilities. it can be achieved. like
all powers. through training and time. That said. they are all ridiculously
powerful in their own right. Since these represent some of the best powers of
a given Type. by purchasing them. you obtain any Tier 3 power within the
pinnacle ability's Type for free. stacking downwards to give you any Tier 2
and Tier 1 similarly.

Note also that the color of the Type does not at all reflect any visual aspect of
the powers; Type Blues can have red effects on their powers. Type Greens
can have blue effects on their powers. and so forth. Art is included
thematically. and the color categorization of each Type is merely for
classification purposes.

objects.title: Aberrant Powers
objects.text:
Aberrant Powers are unique to their users. They cannot be learned by
another, nor developed by someone who is not their child. Aberrants may
overlap freely with Types. as all Types originated genetically as sets of
Aberrants. Aberrants may be thought of as mutations in the gene pool of
Supers, while Types are the overall result of these mutations intermingling.

In terms of commonality, the vast majority of Supers have Aberrant powers
or a Type, or one of each. In some rare cases, a Super may have multiple
Types, or a multiplicity of Aberrant Powers, which after many generations
may result in a new Type genetically unique to their bloodline. Types unique
to a specific family are referred to by the noble gases and other elements,
such as Type Xenon, Type Krypton. and so on, but may also be named after
their original user.

Since powers can be so varied and have so many effects, Magnitude does not
have a direct metric-to—scale factor. There are so many possibilities that
trying to scale according to any metric (radius, force, speed, durability) would
inevitably lead some powers to be under or overestimated, since their
primary function may not be concerned with these measurements at all, like
invisibility or mind reading. Magnitude simply refers to the amplitude of the
metawave emitted by the powers, with higher amplitudes usually correlating
to more extreme abilities. Magnitude is a logarithmic scale, meaning that
each increment is a multiplicative factor stronger than the last. Magnitudes
have ranges, meaning a person at the top of Magnitude 10 might be stronger
than someone at the bottom of Magnitude 10.
