objects.title: Paragon Aberrants
objects.text:
Paragon Aberrants are abilities which have previously served as the vital
powers of high—level Morphic Entities. designed with near—perfect
architecture and with a specific utility in mind for the all—powerful Morphics
who created them. They are the only abilities which can reach above a
Magnitude of 18. a maximum that boggles the mind to even consider.

objects.title: Type Red
objects.text:
The Type Red domain includes powers related to the enhancement of the
body's functions without directly changing it's form. These include not
only rapid healing factors. extreme durability. superhuman strength and
enhanced speed. but also more subtle powers such as superhuman vision
and hearing. ageless physiology. instantaneous reflexes. and more. At their
peak. legendary Type Reds were capable of fully regenerating from near—
total annihilation. lifting millions of tons with a single hand. and enduring
high-output explosives without a scratch.

objects.title: Type Blue
objects.text: The Type Blue domain is typically concerned with enhancement of the mental faculties, such as through enhanced intelligence, precognition, telepathy, psychometry, and so on. They may also include a variety of other psychic feats, such as mind-control, psychokinesis, astral projection, and many more. At their highest level, Type Blues have been able to subtly control the minds of hundreds of thousands to do their bidding, perform calculations of such immense complexity as to alter subspatial geodesics, and telekinetically crush massive structures like tin cans.

objects.title: Type Violet
objects.text:
The Type Violet domain allows its users to manipulate various forms of
sheer energy. such as through kinetic bolts. hard-light constructs. optic
beams. and so on. Depending on the level of the operator. a Type Violet
might be capable of creating simple force-fields and plasma projectiles. or
might be capable of intangibility. subliminal speeds. or screaming barrages
of light that level buildings. At even higher levels. they may howl fonNard
at speeds that dwarf light. absorb the energy of nuclear blasts. or blitz
their enemies with the ferocious heat of a roaring star.

objects.title: Type Green
objects.text:
Type Green may very well be the most complex and versatile domain of the
primary non-genetic Types. In simplified terms. a Type Green is capable of
what most would call “magic." In more complex terms. a Type Green with
sufficient knowledge and occult skill may rift and manipulate boundaries
both archetypal and physical to incalculable potential effects. often
between alternate dimensions. However. Type Greens are often limited by
the complexity of the rifts they can create. or by their own knowledge of a
desirable plane of access. Though Type Greens have the potential to be
immensely powerful and versatile. they seldom reach the peak of their
domain; when they do. the very cosmos shudders before its masters.

objects.title: Type Grey
objects.text:
Feats of the Type Grey domain are not those which strictly defy the laws of
physics. nor those which empower one with extreme supernatural feats.
Rather. the Type Grey domain allows its users to master skillsets to absurd
heights unachievable within a hundred lifetimes. Very often this leads to
scientific minds capable of incredible inventions which. depending on the
skill of the user. may range from futuristic to what is indiscernible from
magic. However. the Type Grey domain is by no means limited to this
archetypical template: powerful Type Greys have been able to
singlehandedly defeat hundreds of armed opponents with sheer martial
prowess. or amass billions of dollars to their name through incredible
financial skill. A Type Grey. in the most literal sense. fulfills every
descriptor of a Nietzschean ubermensch.

objects.title: Type Black
objects.text:
The most notoriously uncontainable Type. powers within this domain.
broadly speaking. concern themselves with obscuring and manipulating
the senses. all-or—nothing attacks. and escaping impossible danger rather
than enduring it. This may include abilities like invisibility. teleportation.
possession. and more. Type Black abilities are infamously deadly and
strategically profitable. but offer little protection for the user in the way of
physical durability or immunity except in the highest levels of operation. It
is considered by many to be one of the highest risk-reward ratios in terms
of Types. and allows its user immense potential for havoc while leaving
them exceptionally vulnerable. at least compared to other Types. Many of
these powers create their intended effects through brute-force methods
such as destiny and matter manipulation.

objects.title: Type Yellow
objects.text:
The Type Yellow domain allows its users to manipulate their own (and
sometimes others”) physical form and biology. Unlike Type Red. abilities in
this domain directly alter the form of the user. and may or may not result
in some sort of enhancement. Powers within this domain include
shapeshifting. gigantic or monstrous forms. adaptive regeneration. and
other transformations both biological and supernatural. In cases where a
Type Yellow user is trained to affect others rather than themselves. they
may be capable of invoking similar effects unto their foes or allies. Though
they have been quite rare. high—level Type Yellows in history have taken
forms the size of skyscrapers. commanded armies of Cronenberg—esque
minions. or healed millions from deadly disease.

objects.title: Type Orange
objects.text:
(Orange requires special mechanics that are not easily implemented with interactive cyoa. You will need to keep track of it yourself Good Luck)

The powers of a Type Orange user are very different across users. Tire
domain. broadly speaking. allows its user to manipulate. create. and
annihilate specific types of objects or materials. such as fire. metal. air. or
plasma. Like all Types. it is possible for one user to learn the same
manipulation as another Type Orange. However. one can attain
exponentially more power in their chosen manipulation if their skill is not
spread across multiple manipulations. Typically. the most skilled Type
Orange users have used only one. or at most two. manipulation types.
choosing very broadly applicable materials or objects and mastering them
to the extreme. Outliers have existed. of course. from arrow manipulators
to glass manipulators. The more broad a material or object. the more
difficult it is to master. Legendary users of the Type Orange domain have
manipulated such high-level objects as liquids. vacuums, and even
antimatter.

objects.title: Unlock Tier 1
objects.text:
Low level Type Abilities.
(Grants 1 Tertiary Manipulation Slot for Orange)

objects.title: Unlock Tier 2
objects.text:
Medium level Type Abilities.
(Grants 1 Secondary Manipulation Slot for Orange)

objects.title: Unlock Tier 3
objects.text:
High level Type Abilities.
(Grants 1 Primary Manipulation Slot for Orange)

objects.title: Regeneration (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
Regardless of what injuries you sustain. if you
survive the damages. you will recover within 24
hours. This regeneration is not quick. and will
usually require all 24 hours to fully heal.
However. it is extremely thorough: everything
from your eye color to your liver will be
reconstructed exactly as it once was.

objects.title: Death Grip (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
While your normal musculature remains
unchanged. your grip and jaw strength are
enhanced beyond what any human could
achieve: your bite could crush bone. and your
fingers can dig into solid metal or concrete like
clay.

objects.title: Sensory Suite (Mag. 3)
objects.text:
Your hearing and vision are enhanced to detect
and focus on audiovisual stimuli from multiple
miles away. capable of hearing a shriek for
help across an entire city. or seeing the brand
of ajet flying at 30,000 feet.

objects.title: Instant Reflex (Mag. 2)
objects.text:
While the typical human's reflexes take roughly
a quarter-second to register a threat or
stimulus. yours are truly instant. The overall
effect is that you're a split second faster at
nearly everything. from hand-to-hand combat
up to and including avoiding gunfire by seeing
the flex of a gunman's finger before he even
does.

objects.title: Lifeline (Mag. 3)
objects.text:
You are marginally immune to the effects of
aging. and completely immune to the effects of
disease. If you do not die of unnatural causes.
you could feasibly live up to 300 years. and
never visually age beyond your prime.

objects.title: Custom Type Red (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
Create a small Type Red ability which is
thematically appropriate, follows the rules of
Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of
4. like other abilities within Tier 1. You may
only fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Super Strength (Mag. 7)
objects.text:
Your lifting and striking force are drastically
enhanced. and your overall strength is as if you
were a hundred times larger. You do not suffer
the practical issues with such immense
strength. such as breaking your own fist
against metal. or being thrown backwards by
the momentum of a tossed car.

objects.title: Ageless (Mag. 6)
objects.text:
Your mental and physical faculties no longer
degrade with time beyond a point of your
choice. Memories don’t fade as you grow older.
and your body will remain in its prime
condition until you die of unnatural causes.
unaging and eternal.

objects.title: Flight (Mag 8)
objects.text:
You are capable of flight at sonic speeds.
outpacing commercial airliners and designer
automobiles alike. You must move in the same
direction for at least a few seconds to achieve
this maximum speed. and a few more to
decelerate. As expected. you are immune to
the practical effects of altitude.

objects.title: Enduring (Mag. 8)
objects.text:
You possess incredible stamina and durability.
You could run a thousand miles and never tire.
or endure gunfire without a scratch. It is as if
your entire body were made of hyper-
compressed steel. with the structural integrity
of a tank twenty times over. Only high-impact
explosives could seriously damage you. with
mundane calamities like falling from great
heights. hand—to—hand combat. or piercing
forces leaving you totally unscathed.

objects.title: Vibration (Mag 9)
objects.text:
You are capable of unbelievable speeds of
motion. but your speeds exponentially decay
the more distance you or your extremities
cover. For instance. you could subtly vibrate at
immense speeds if your body only ever moves
molecular distances. allowing solid matter to
phase through you. At a greater distance. say
the length of your arms and legs. you could
move at utterly blinding speeds and oven/vhelm
opponents with thousands of high—impact
strikes per second.

objects.title: Custom Type Red (Mag 9)
objects.text:
Create a Type Red ability which is thematically
appropriate. follows the rules of Aberrants. and
does not exceed a Magnitude of 9. like other
abilities within Tier 2. You may only fill this slot
with one custom power.

objects.title: Extreme Speed (Mag. 10)
objects.text:
You are capable of running and moving at
supersonic speeds exceeding Mach 100 when
at full acceleration. For reference. that's
quadruple the speed of modern spacecraft.
Moreover. your accelerations occur in the blink
of an eye. allowing you to turn on a dime or
make quick bursts of movement with ease.
When you move at this speed. your perception
of time slows to appropriately allow you to
make decisions. You do not produce sonic
booms. and are protected from any damages
such speeds would cause. If you can fly. you
may fly at these same speeds. Actually using
these speeds to deal blows can be utterly
devastating.

objects.title: Nervous Perfection (Mag. 10)
objects.text:
Your nervous system is perfected beyond the
limits of physical biology. Your senses are so
absurdly powerful that they could hear a call
for help across a whole continent. or make out
individual planets in faraway galaxies in the
night sky. or kinesthetically sense minute
changes in air pressure or vibrations in the
ground to make out everyone in a room or
sense movements from miles away. Your brain
possesses every possible advantage which
could be granted by physical or chemical
alteration. such as eidetic memory. extreme
calculative speeds. pattern recognition. and so
forth. Finally. your body is essentially
autokinetic, responding perfectly to your every
command. allowing you to perform incredible
feats of martial arts and physical precision with
no prior experience whatsoever. coordinated to
the point of insanity. with instantaneous
reaction times to boot.

objects.title: Stasis Field (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
Your physical body and anything touching it is
in vector stasis. except in relation to forces
which you yourself exert. This may protect you
from. among other things. aging. explosive
attacks, and even the effects of gravity. In
layman's terms. there is a subatomically thin
field in which time does not flow surrounding
your body and what it's touching. preventing
damages, aging. disease. and more. You may
toggle this field at will and selectively allow
vectors to penetrate your stasis field if you
wish. so that gravity can affect you while still
preventing damage. and so on. Notably. this
also adds to your offensive capabilities: since
anything touching you may be put in vector
stasis. you can swipe your hand through solid
matter with little resistance. or hold up
immense weights as if they were weightless.

objects.title: Sentinel (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
You possess immense strength and durability
rivaling some of the best in superhuman
history. Your strength is sufficient to lift over a
million tons in one hand. or roughly three
Empire State Buildings. for reference. Your
body is made of an unbelievably durable
lattice—like anomalous substance which could
endure some of the most feared weapons of
our modern age. barring perhaps nuclear
explosives. To put it into perspective, when
you do actually take damage. you don't tear or
bend; you chip like metal. However. because
you don't directly control the forces exerted
against you. you can still be knocked off your
feet or pushed. though next to nothing could
ever damage your body.

objects.title: Nucleus (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
You are capable of full regeneration from a
single living cell in a period less than 20
seconds. though this is seldom how long it
takes. Your body will. by default. regenerate
itself from the largest collection of remaining
cells available. As a side—effect. you are
immune to all bodily diseases and
dysfunctions. as your body heals not only
physical injury. but also wear—and-tear caused
by genetic disorders or pathogens.

objects.title: Custom Type Red (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
Create a Type Red ability which is thematically
appropriate. follows the rules of Aberrants. and
does not exceed a Magnitude of 12. like other
abilities within Tier 3. You may only fill this slot
with one custom power.

objects.title: Leviathan: (Mag. 16)
objects.text:
You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Red. Your primary ability is
the manipulation of forces exerted on or by your own body. with nearly no
upper boundary on your exertion. This means you can exert the force of
high—yield antimatter explosives with a light backhand. fly at mind
boggling superluminal speeds. and endure the entire world's nuclear
arsenals ten times over without so much as a scratch. Your strength is
absurd enough to move celestial bodies or reshape continents with an
orbital dropkick. You may either annul the force of attacks made against
you. causing bullets to harmlessly fall in a shower of lead at your feet. or
you may deflect these forces back in kind. causing projectiles to ricochet
and fists to break upon your chest. If you do not consciously direct the
force vectors created by your powers. you will completely nullify all forces
your powers can exert back, and exponentially weaken incomprehensible
forces of the cosmos: the epicenter of a black hole will pull with the force
of a mild wind. the heat of the center of a star may cause a light
discomfort. and standing at the epicenter of a supernova may slightly
ruffle your hair. Truly indomitable or infinite forces like matter erasure.
extradimensional rending. or space manipulations made against you can
exert only the damage a mundane punch might. You may extend the forces
you exert and your protective field to anything you touch or hold directly
or indirectly. meaning you may carry unpowered people at superliminal
speeds without harming them and prevent damage to your clothing or
possessions on your person. Similarly. because the forces you output
aren't actually dependent on your muscles. you may exert impossible
leverages and balance objects perfectly with minor or impossible
movements.

Your sensory faculties are maximized to their most absurd degrees: you can focus your hearing to comprehend conversations across entire planets. see
the details of alien worlds by looking into the night sky or see the movement of strings and quantum particles in your hand. and even feel vibrations in the
air with such precision as to tell the differences between people's footsteps a continent away. You move with subatomic accuracy. capable of catching
bullets in the air or defeating even the most skilled hand-to-hand combatants at their own game with ease. You no longer possess needs of any kind. be
they physical ones such as air. sustenance, water, sleep. or more abstract psychological ones. You may consume any of these as you require normally. but
will suffer no negative effects if you do not choose to. Your mind is upgraded to its optimal physical connectivity and makeup. meaning you are immune to
the negative psychological effects of stress. ennui. boredom. and so on. Similarly. you have a perfected memory and computational intelligence. though
your mind does not exceed what is possible given the physical limits of a perfected human brain. You have a healing factor which in the blink of an eye
could restore you from ribbons to your full faculties, requiring only the existence of intact DNA to regrow your full form, though the circumstances under
which you’d ever take such damage are unimaginably improbable.

objects.title: Enhanced Mind (Mag. 2)
objects.text: Most of your intellectual processes are offloaded to your powers, meaning you can perform high-level problem solving and critical thinking instantaneously. You have an effective 280 IQ, and the speed at which you move from stimulation to calculation to action is as fast as your neurons can physically fire, never requiring even a moment of consideration.

objects.title: Psychometry (Mag. 4)
objects.text: You can acquire information about where an object or person has been and what it or they have done through direct physical contact. This may include assessing places someone has visited, others they have spoken with, people they have killed or aided, and so forth.

objects.title: Oneiropotent (Mag. 4)
objects.text: You may enter and manipulate the dreams of others in nearly any way, from simply using them as a medium of remote communication to psychologically jarring your opponents by causing them nightmares. So long as nothing you do within these dreams affects the subject physically, you can make them experience nearly anything. You may do this to one person at a time.

objects.title: Levitation (Mag. 4)
objects.text: You may move yourself and objects in the vertical direction relative to yourself, up to a strength you yourself might be capable of exerting. You cannot move objects horizontally, nor can you move them along diagonals. Using this ability, you can feasibly float up small distances, hover downward as you descend from a great height, or otherwise.

objects.title: Extrasense (Mag. 3)
objects.text: You have a sixth sense, which could accurately be compared to air current detection or smell, but which detects danger. If you or those you wish to protect are in immediate danger or are likely going to be, you will sense this like a current in the air, though you are not made immediately aware what the source of the danger is.

objects.title: Custom Type Blue (Mag. 4)
objects.text: Create a small Type Blue ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 4, like other abilities within Tier 1 .You may only fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Multisense (Mag. 8)
objects.text: You may extend your senses in an infinite number of simultaneous directions with little to no range limitation, as if thousands of astral projections controlled by you were exiting your body all at once. Your mind is adapted to process a feasibly infinite number of sensory inputs simultaneously, meaning you are never overwhelmed by being able to see in a million places at once. With this ability, you can survey the entire battlefield, watch your own and your teammate’s backs in a quite literal sense, search any object or person out in mere seconds, or read thousands of novels simultaneously without ever physically opening them.

objects.title: Hypnotist (Mag. 9)
objects.text: You have the ability to directly control the minds of others, if they cannot resist or psychically overpower you. For those not skilled in blocking such influences, or who are not psychics themselves, this is a trivial task. Once under your control, you must directly dictate their every action via this power, and they will not be able to act of their own accord until you lose concentration or release them. You may control as many people as you can keep in mind at once, and control their actions in tandem manually. Note that all manipulations through this ability are manual, and must be directly dictated by the user.

objects.title: Deduction (Mag. 7)
objects.text: Your mind is capable of deducting any conclusion which you have sufficient information to know, assuming you could make the connections between them. For instance, you could see someone’s shoe size, determine their height, then determine their gender, then determine their genetic propensities on the basis of those facts, then make an approximate sketch of their face. You don’t learn or know all of the information used to chain deductions together, since it could feasibly be overwhelming, but you know what conclusions are drawn as the end result.

objects.title: Mindread (Mag. 7)
objects.text: You can read the minds of others if you can psychically overpower them. For all those who aren’t psychics themselves, or who are not trained in blocking psychic influences, this process is trivial. Once done, you may sift through nearly any thought or experience they have ever had, so long as they remember it. This can be done in mere seconds, flooding you with all the information you could ever want to know about a person, and more. This ability can be performed remotely, and, if the individual has no resistances, discreetly.

objects.title: Telekinesis (Mag. 9)
objects.text: You can move objects and exert forces with a hundred times your normal strength, though this ability is more tied to how strong you believe yourself to be than how strong you are physically. You may exert these forces precisely or broadly, or in multiple places at once, so long as you are not using more than a hundred times your own strength at any given time. This includes crushing, spinning, weaving, or any other task you could feasibly perform with your hands, given that you can exert separate forces from any angle you see fit.

objects.title: Custom Type Blue (Mag. 9)
objects.text: Create a Type Blue ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 9, like other abilities within Tier 2.You may only fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Hyperkinesis (Mag. 12)
objects.text: You can exert utterly enormous telekinetic forces, the likes of which can only be replicated by subnuclear ballistic missiles or the world’s best hydraulics hundreds of times over. You could feasibly crush tanks with a telekinetic twitch, much less the human body. You may divide this overall maximum among every separate force you exert at once, feasibly acting in hundreds of distinct places at a time. Your precision is utterly phenomenal in the application of these forces, likened to humanity’s most precise industrial technologies. These forces may be exerted on yourself, allowing you explosively fast flight, and may also be used to protect yourself from oncoming forces, holding bullets mid-air or stopping an opponent in their tracks.

objects.title: Intellect Matrix (Mag. 10)
objects.text: Your mental performance is increased to levels of parody. Your mind is a cold, crystalline machine capable of calculation speeds that compare to hypothetical quantum supercomputers. You remember every detail of everything you experience, and are never overwhelmed by absurd inflows of information. This may include insane deductions and predictions that to an outside observer look like extrasensory scrying, or calculating hundreds of thousands of scenarios in your head and planning for all of them instantly, or calculating pi to ten billion digits in a split second, or memorizing every one and zero in every line of code ever written as if it were nothing.

objects.title: Oracle (Mag. 11)
objects.text: You can see into the currently predestined future and the concrete past millions and millions of years into the future or long ago, unimpeded by the effects of abilities like time travel or other retrocausal powers. Similarly, your mind calculates billions of potential futures you could create by acting on this knowledge of the future, and when you undertake such actions, recalculates the predestined future you see with these powers. You could prevent catastrophes millions of years in the making with the slightest adjustments, or slip past danger and predict opponents like you’d lived through those events a thousand times.

objects.title: Mindmolder (Mag. 12)
objects.text: You are an absurdly powerful telepath, with mental manipulation abilities that rival some of the best on Earth: you can read minds like a book, wipe and replace memories, control thousands of minds overtly or hundreds of thousands subtly, implant thoughts which the subject believes to be their own, and minutely adjust behaviors they will believe are their own will. Similarly, you can communicate via telepathy to tens of thousands at a time, or deceive any one of your subject’s senses with ease. The number of manipulations you may perform at once is simply the number you can keep track of in your own mind, and this skill will improve immensely with continued use.

objects.title: Senseweave (Mag. 10)
objects.text: You can create nearly any manipulation of a target’s senses, supernatural or otherwise, if you can psychically subdue them. This can range from altering who you appear to be to creating entire illusory scenarios and worlds, leaving them to helplessly live in the delusion you have created. You can even distort more obscure senses, such as one’s sense of time, balance, or the kinesthetic senses. Even subtle uses of this ability can be strategic keys to victory, disrupting the cohesion of ironclad teams or causing a fatal mistake that makes your enemy falter. If your subject has no resistances, this ability may be used discreetly.

objects.title: Custom Type Blue (Mag. 12)
objects.text: Create a Type Blue ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 12, like other abilities within Tier 3.You may only fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Hypnos: (Mag. 17)
objects.text:
You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Blue. Your range of
extrasensory perception is nearly all-encompassing. and you can perceive
even the subtlest events across multiple dimensions and universes without
becoming overwhelmed by the flood of information. Future. past. present.
possible. and impossible are all within the range of your mind's eye. You
can perceive the exact actions required to achieve any possible future. a-Ia
Path to Victory. and the circumstances which would bring about any other
too. Your mind is capable of post—Zettascale computations on the 53th
order of magnitude. equal to dozens of Matrioshka brains in sheer
calculative power. As such. the human mind is closer to inert matter than it
is to yours. The psychokinetic forces and effects you can exert are on the
scale of dozens of Hydrogen bombs. and your skill with wielding them is
no less impressive: continued exertion of these forces and effects does not
require concentration of any kind. and you are precise in their usage down
to the molecular level. You could excite particles to create storms of fractal
psychic fire. or move air to create strong electric fields and vicious
lightning. Your telepathy could search through. control. or manipulate the
minds of hundreds of millions or even several billion at a time. whether
subtly or overtly and in almost any way you choose. If there is knowledge
you somehow don't already possess, you could feasibly read and memorize
every word ever written by humans faster than a lesser man might blink.
While your physical body does not gain any supernatural protections. you
can repel forces with such almighty telekinetic force that none of
humanity's weaponry would ever be able to overcome you. You can use any
and all of these abilities on yourself. allowing you to fly at breakneck

speeds. restore your body from damage. etc. More subtly. your mind is actually manipulating spatial geodesics when it exerts these physical effects. and
as such. your abilities include manipulations of space which would require cosmic masses: wells of gravitation. instantaneous teleportation. and massive
repelling and attractive forces. to name a few.

objects.title: Kinetic Bolt (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
You can shape and fire bolts of kinetic energy
from your extremities which hit with immense
force and speed. impacting as if they were a
solid. heavy object and then dissipating against
their target. with the speed of a fastball and
concussive force to boot. You may adjust how
hard these bolts hit below this maximum.

objects.title: Light Shield (Mag. 3)
objects.text:
You can create energetic shields with a raised
hand that are as tall and wide as you are. and
can endure forces and absorb shock as if they
were made of reinforced concrete. These light
shields are weightless and will remain attached
to your palm until you allow them to dissipate
or they are broken.

objects.title: Heat Touch (Mag. 2)
objects.text:
You can manipulate heat convection within a
certain magnitude using touch alone. The heat
you produce is sufficient to light most objects
on fire or weaken the structural integrity of
dense metals. giving them a red—hot glow. in
general. this ability can perform any feat a
blowtorch could, or cool objects to a similar
magnitude.

objects.title: Photosynthetic (Mag. 3)
objects.text:
When you are in direct ultraviolet light of any
kind. including from the sun. you have a slow
but highly effective healing factor. Similarly.
while you are in direct ultraviolet light. you
have enhanced endurance which would allow
you to survive many blunt forces, such as
being hit by a truck. with little more than mild
bruising. Penetrative forces (blades. bullets) are
unaffected by this endurance. Similarly.
sunlight can refill any Energy Pool abilities you
possess.

objects.title: Energy Pool 1: (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
You have a pool of raw anomalous energy
which cannot expand. but will regenerate after
it is used in proportion to how much of your
pool remains: that is. if you've expended all of
it. it will regenerate faster. With your stored
energy. you can perform a variety of feats:
temporarily increasing your speed. lessening
incoming forces to protect yourself or to fall
slower. and creating plasma projectiles in the
air. This pool is relatively small. but the variety
of feats you can perform with it largely
outweigh the downsides.

objects.title: Custom Type Violet (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
Create a small Type Violet ability which is
thematically appropriate. follows the rules of
Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of
4. like other abilities within Tier 1.You may
only fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Empty Flight (Mag. 8)
objects.text:
You gain the ability to fly. with maximum
speeds in the sonic range. The faster you are
flying. the faster your mass converts into pure
energy. eventually rendering you intangible so
long as you don't stop. You may
instantaneously accelerate to your desired
speeds. allowing you to turn on a dime at
sportscar speeds, or fully stop in a fraction of a
second. If you want to remain fully tangible.
you should fly at speeds below that of a sports
car. As expected. you are immune to the
practical effects of altitude.

objects.title: Hardllght Geometry (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
You may create hard light constructs in any
simple third-dimensional shape. such as
cones, blocks. spheres. and so on. They cannot
move once they are created until you revoke
them. Their durability is proportional to their
size. meaning that small personal barriers can
prove highly effective. while large-scale fields
may have the durability of glass or even paper.
depending on how extreme you push them.
Once broken. the construct will dissipate.

objects.title: Zero-Point Beam (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
Rather than expelling energy. you can create a
beam which flows from an object or person
back into your hands or eyes, sapping them of
an energy type of your choice. be it thermal.
kinetic. radiative. etc. In the most basic cases.
this can hold quick opponents in place by
sapping their momentum. or quite literally
freeze objects by revoking their thermal
energy. Any energy you absorb with this power
will refill any Energy Pool powers you have. if
you have them.

objects.title: Energy Pool 2 (Mag. 8)
objects.text:
Your energy pool may expand over time with
regular usage. expanding and refilling in
proportion to how often it is emptied and how
empty it is. Your feat variety is drastically
increased; you can use this energy to fly with
great speeds, stop objects mid-air by equaling
their momentum with an expenditure of
energy. or fire high-impact beams and bolts
from your extremities which can melt steel and
crush cars with sustained fire. along will all the
feats described in Energy Pool 1.

objects.title: Solar Panel (Mag. 7)
objects.text:
Energy you absorb through light of any kind
will rapidly heal any wounds. reverse aging to
your prime condition, and grant enhanced
durability in proportion to its intensity.
Similarly. any Energy Pool you possess will refill
in response to light. This regeneration could
close fatal wounds in less than a minute with
an intense source of light. and grant you
durability that makes bullets leave light
bruises.

objects.title: Custom Type Violet (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
Create a Type Violet ability which is
thematically appropriate. follows the rules of
Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of
9. like other abilities within Tier 2. You may
only fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Pixelate (Mag. 11)
objects.text:
Your physical body is now primarily a
projection of energy into matter. You may
depixelate your body into sheer energy to
teleport at mind—bending near—liminal speeds,
though you cannot see while moving this
quickly. making it most effective for short or
extremely long distances in a straight
trajectory. Moreover. any damage you take can
be repixelated, and this process is sped up
dramatically by light or energy from any Energy
Pool ability. Even if your body is completely
destroyed. so long as you depixelate before
your death and the intangible energy that
makes you up remains. you may eventually
repixelate your body given time. You may use
your own body mass as fuel for any Energy
Pool abilities.

objects.title: Antimass (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
At will. your body may become truly and totally
intangible and semitransluscent. In this state.
your body will absorb any ambient energy
entering your body, including radiation. heat.
light. kinetic forces. and so on, all of which will
filter into any Energy Pool abilities you possess.
You can only absorb a certain amount of
energy in this way before your capacity is
reached. at which point energy will slowly
bleed into mass. reforming your physical body.
If you haven't reached this limit. you have
absolutely zero mass. and as such. you can fly
at more than ten times the speed of light.
While in this antimass state. you cannot affect
objects physically. though you can still use any
energy attacks or remote abilities you have.
Similarly. so long as this state remains intact.
you possess no physical needs. allowing you to
explore the far reaches of space. or make
circuits around our solar system in minutes.
You may allow light to pass near-perfectly
through your body when in this state,
achieving near invisibility.

objects.title: Energy Pool 3 (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
You possess an absurdly expansive energy
pool. which will grow even larger the most
often it is used. Similarly. assuming you are not
launching city-eradicating barrages in rapid
succession or flying at absurd speeds. your
energy pool can usually replace the energy you
use faster than you expend it. The feats you
can perform using this pool are nearly endless.
from superheating objects with a flashing
glare. to destroying city blocks with a single
blast. to flying at truly mind blowing speeds. to
focusing precise beams that cut through dense
steel like butter. along with any and all feats
described within Energy Pool 2. This is merely
a small sample of what you can really do. and
you'll continually discover new ways to shape
this energy to your advantage.

objects.title: Effect Suite (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
You have the ability to fire extremely precise.
extreme—impact energy blasts. bolts. beams.
spheres. and so on which can destroy all your
eyes can see in a matter of seconds. In
addition. all of these energy projections can
have an incredible variety of effects: freezing.
piercing. heating. electrocuting. disintegrating,
exploding. pixelating, illuminating. and force-
exerting. You're a living arsenal of effect
beams. and you have a deadly answer to nearly
any threat.

objects.title: Fractal Hardlight (Mag. 11)
objects.text:
You may create hard light constructions of
feasibly infinite complexity. replicating any
imaginable shape with ease. These may be
used to create entrapping barriers. personal
shields that perfectly fit your body and the
bodies of your allies. or encase foes. Any beam
or projectile which can be fired from your body
can be fired from the interior or exterior of
these constructs. meaning you could create
floating turrets of plasma. or entrap an enemy
and nuke them with a barrage of blasts from
the inside. Once broken. the construct will
dissipate. though their endurance is truly
absurd compared to most mundane matter.

objects.title: Custom Type Violet(Mag. 12)
objects.text:
Create a Type Violet ability which is
thematically appropriate. follows the rules of
Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of
12. like other abilities within Tier 2. You may
only fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Hyperion: (Mag. 16)
objects.text:
You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Violet. You have ceased to
be bound to physical matter itself, and are now an energetic being. Your
body is a solid projection of sheer energy. and as such may be
regenerated. abandoned. or reconstituted as you require. Moreover. your
body does not have any natural needs of any kind. You have and you are
an infinite wellspring of sheer anomalous energy. and the versatility with
which you can wield this energy is absolutely unparalleled. You can fire
high-intensity beams the width of skyscrapers from an outstretched palm.
or create homing beams which scream through the air towards their target.
You may fire anti-energetic beams which hold opponents in place. or fire
barrages of energy which impact billions of times per second, or fork your
attacks into exponential shining projectiles as they reach their target. You
may organize this high-density energy in nearly any desired way. from
orbiting disintegration spheres to solid shapes which disassemble matter
on the atomic level. Your minute control over the intensity of these attacks.
their behavior. and their configuration is utterly astounding. You could go
from redrawing countries with a single blast to precisely melting bullets as
they fly through the air as if this transition were nothing. Moreover. you
may precisely control the scope of these attacks to prevent collateral
damage while firing devastating attacks. Just as you can project your body
using your energy. you may project solid photokinetic constructs such as
force-fields. faux—weaponry. or invisible shields.

Because your physical body only has mass insofar as you decide it does.
your movement capabilities are not limited to the speed of light. You can

move omnidirectionally at any finite speed you desire. up to and including septillions of times the speed of light. altering your mass into total intangibility
as greater and greater velocities are required. surpassing even the effects of time dilation. You may surround objects and people you touch. wear. or carry
with energy so that they may also survive superliminal flight. the vacuum of space. or the core of stars. By altering your mass to zero. you may become
intangible at will or on instinct to avoid damage. though this is seldom necessary: you can close wounds or repair body parts by reprojecting your energy
back into your physical form.

objects.title: Clairvoyance (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
You may shift your senses to view into any
alternate worlds in tandem with our own.
though your senses are bound to where you
stand in our own world. This can be immensely
useful for gathering information. especially if
the alternate world you search out is similar to
our own.

objects.title: Restore (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
You can replace broken objects with intact
copies from the farthest space. including to
heal others or yourself. This ability has
difficulty replacing complex structures such as
vital organs or high-level technology. and
furthermore requires a semi-intact reference:
something completely shattered or burned
beyond recognition cannot be restored using
this power. since you require a semi-intact
copy in order to find a suitable replacement.

objects.title: Bind (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
Any non-living object which you can hold in
your hands may be temporarily shunted into
mystic storage. where it may be accessed
through this power at your leisure. This can be
extremely useful for storing supplies of any
kind. utilities. enchantment components.
alchemical materials. costumes. or anything
else a master of the mystic may require.

objects.title: Spectral Messenger (Mag. 2)
objects.text:
With a touch. you may place a rune of
communication on any living being. and you
may revoke these at will. You may broadcast
any message you desire to all living things
which have this rune of communication on
them. though this is one—way. and your
message may be ignored if so desired. This can
serve as an immensely effective tool for teams
of superhumans. as well as for any summoned
minions you may possess.

objects.title: Antimagic (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
With a brief preparative ritual. you can prevent
latent mystical effects such as charms, curses,
hexes. and so on. for a period proportional to
your skill as a sorcerer. This initially does not
protect against physical attacks such as
fireballs. summoned beasts. and so on. but
may grow to help dampen these extreme
effects with time and practice.

objects.title: Custom Type Green (Mag. 4)
objects.text:
Create a small Type Green ability which is
thematically appropriate. follows the rules of
Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of
4. like other abilities within Tier 1. You may fill
this slot with one custom power. Type Green
abilities at lower levels should be very specific
rather than general.

objects.title: Golemancy (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
You may temporarily imbue life in any
inanimate object made to resemble a living
thing. such as dolls. clay soldiers. statues. and
so on. The interval in which they will
independently remain animate is dependent on
your skill as a sorcerer, and is inversely
proportional to how large the object is. If the
object is still intact once this interval runs out.
you may manually reanimate it again. ad
infinitum, so long as you are physically present
to animate it and able to concentrate for long
enough to do 50. All such objects you give life
will unerringly do your bidding.

objects.title: Wormhole (Mag. 8)
objects.text:
You may. with a touch. create two types of
runes on any surface: a rune of dislocation and
a rune of destination. Any rune of dislocation
will open a wormhole to a chosen rune of
destination. meaning you could feasibly place a
rune and have multiple wormholes to the same
place. You may not place these in or on
surfaces which are not sufficiently flat. such as
the human body. round objects. or otherwise.
The size of the wormhole these runes create is
dependent on the area of the flat surface they
are placed on and your skill as a sorcerer.

objects.title: Element Rift (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
You may open rifts to any pure dimension of
one of the four classical elements: fire. water.
earth. or air. These rifts will explode forth with
whatever element they are associated with.
often difficult to control unless you are a highly
skilled practitioner. These may be opened and
closed near-instantly to create bolts of any of
these elements. or may be left open to create
deadly streams of elemental destruction.

objects.title: Force Rune (Mag 8)
objects.text:
You may draw a glowing shape or rune in the
air. where it will remain until dispelled. At will.
you may fling massive repulsive or attractive
forces from the area of this shape. with the
effect of either an immense vacuum or a harsh
compressed air current. The forces which this
shape may exert are proportional to the
shape's complexity and your skill as a sorcerer.
meaning they may range from harsh gusts to
explosive forces that could dent tanks.

objects.title: Charm (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
You may entangle nonliving objects and force
them to share a physical property of your
choice. If you were to entangle a sabre and a
pool of lava. you could force them to share the
quality of heat: if you were to entangle two
vehicles. you could make them share fuel
reserves; if you were to entangle your own
robes and a steel object. you could feasibly
wear a suit of armor without any of the brittle
weight of steel. To entangle two objects. you
must touch the two objects you wish to
entangle in order. Entanglements are
permanent unless you should dispel them or
the entangled effect is lost. and do not work on
organic, living matter.

objects.title: Custom Type Green (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
Create a Type Green ability which is
thematically appropriate, follows the rules of
Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of
9. like other abilities within Tier 2. You may fill
this slot with one custom power. Type Green
abilities at middle levels may be more general.
but functionally specific.

objects.title: Summon/Banish (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
You may summon and banish extraplanar
materials. objects. and lifeforms to and from
their respective dimensions of origin. Your only
limitation is the amount of material you may
summon and banish at a time. which may
increase dramatically with time. Using this
ability. you could summon destructive
monstrosities from alien worlds. pour
fountains of boiling plutonium on your foes
from some far—off world. or send solar winds
from the surface of alien stars careening
towards your enemies. The applications and
possibilities are endless. Note. however. that
you may only use this ability to move objects
from their plane of origin to your own. and
vice-versa; you cannot force enemies from our
world into alien worlds. since you did not take
them from there. Banishment is primarily
useful for revoking anything you summon. or
casting out extraplanar threats as they arrive
upon our Earth.

objects.title: Necromancer (Mag. 10)
objects.text:
When a living thing dies. you may use a
number of powers on them; if they are recently
dead. and their body is roughly preserved, you
may replace them with a living version from
any alternate reality. While this is not “true"
resurrection. it replaces them with an
effectively similar clone. who may or may not
be somewhat rattled by the sudden transfer. If
the living thing is not recently dead. or their
body is not roughly intact. you may resurrect
them as a thrall. who acts as a permanent
golem that may do your bidding. Their
continued life is not dependent on the integrity
of their body. and may shamble. crawl. or walk
in the absence of any or all vital organs. These
thralls do not possess the consciousness of
their living counterpart. and are merely
animated flesh. Finally, you may replace any
dead or decaying portion of your body with
younger. healthier flesh from an alternate
version of yourself. making you an effectively
immortal lich unless killed unnaturally.

objects.title: Enchantment (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
You may imbue objects and persons with
nearly any quality. archetypal or physical. with
the severity. abstractness, and scale of
enchanted effects being tied to your skill as a
sorcerer. You could. for instance. give water
the quality of solidity. or an obstruction the
quality of intangibility, or a heavy object the
quality of weightlessness. As this skill becomes
more and more second nature. its versatility
will become increasingly apparent. There are a
few distinct. but overall uninhibiting limitations
to this ability: it cannot add or subtract matter
from existence. it cannot create effects which
could not exist given our laws of physics. and
it cannot nullify or interrupt the effects of
anomalies or powers.

objects.title: Planeswalk (Mag. 11)
objects.text:
Your body is enchanted with protection against
ambient environments and extraplanar physics
of all kinds. At will. you may open a wormhole
to nearly any alternate plane you have access
to. as well as to any position within any plane.
including your own, effectively granting you
infinite—range teleportation. As your skill as a
sorcerer increases. you will be able to access
more and more abstract planes. When you
open or close a wormhole. you leave behind a
temporary rift which may be reopened by
significant powers if you attempt to entrap an
exceedingly dangerous opponent in a hellish
landscape. The size of the wormholes you may
open will also increase with your skills as a
sorcerer. beginning at a size appropriate for
yourself to enter and exit.

objects.title: Illusionist (Mag. 10)
objects.text:
You can shift the senses of other beings to
sense within any alternate universe or
dimension of your choosing. effectively
allowing you to create complex and nuanced
illusions to deceive nearly anyone. or yourself
if necessary. Since you have access to billions
of billions of scenarios for any given situation.
you could show them a reality in which you are
defeated while you escape. or one in which
their allies take on your likeness. causing them
to fight among one another. The possibilities.
both diabolical or otherwise. are endless.

objects.title: Custom Type Green (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
Create a Type Green ability which is
thematically appropriate. follows the rules of
Aberrants. and does not exceed a Magnitude of
12. like other abilities within Tier 3. You may
fill this slot with one custom power. Type
Green abilities at high levels may be
exceptionally general and lesser in scale. or
more specific and much greater in scale.

objects.title: Thoth: (Mag 17)
objects.text:
You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Green. and are the
unquestioned authority over all things arcane. You no longer require much
of the subtle equilibrium of most practitioners of the mystic. and can rend
cosmic bounds both archetypal and physical to achieve an unspeakable
variety of effects. limited only by your imagination and your arcane
knowledge. You are immediately given an initial plethora of mystic
knowledge to begin with. which includes an enormous number of spells
and rites that may be expanded upon later. This may include the
summoning of grotesque beings from the spheres beyond. incredible
enchantments and curses to imbue supernatural qualities. selective
alteration of physical laws around you. the summoning and banishing
objects and beings to and from the farthest space. and far more. Your
ability to overlap and rift the planescape is dependent upon your relative
arcane knowledge and the strangeness of planes you rift; that is. how
vastly different and alien their physical laws. their cosmos. and so on might
be. Enchantments and well-crafted charms can imbue you with immortality
by continually replacing your damaged biology. or automatically redirect
projectile attacks into a portal to the plane of emptiness. You could even
do the same to your foes. if you can keep your seal intact as they fight to
escape. Your skills in alchemy and transmutation allow you to perform
equivalent exchange. create brews and objects of strange and arcane
properties. and more. Better still. the scale and magnitude of effects you
can create is truly mind blowing. from razing huge areas with a storm of
wind and fire to encasing dangerous foes in prisons of impenetrable
diamond. You never lack the skill for a spell. and should you lack requisite

knowledge. it may be acquired with brief study to discover incredible new additions to your arsenal of magic. Furthermore. you possess truly eidetic
memory and natural intelligence. so that you might acquire new arcane knowledge with ease. Depending upon your desired spellcraft. rituals. arcane
symbols. incantations. and more can drastically increase the range and potency of your mystic arsenal. and you benefit exponentially from such
preparations. Exploring the cosmos through portals of your creation. arcane research into the mysteries beyond. and practical creativity can all enhance
your abilities in variety to make you truly unstoppable.

objects.title: Flow State (Mag. 3)
objects.text: You may enter a flow-state for multiple hours, so long as your concentration isn’t interrupted. While in this state, your cognition processing allows you to consider in an instant what might require several hours of planning and achieve precise motor feats far beyond what you’re normally capable of. This has applications for engineering and calculation, but also hand-to-hand combat, firearm aim, and in-the-moment strategy.

objects.title: Autopilot (Mag. 3)
objects.text: You may perform any body movement or calculation method you have performed before exactly as you performed it, as if replaying a video. This means that, with practice, you could replicate the perfect piano concerto, or the perfect roundhouse, or the perfect solder, every single time with total consistency, assuming you’ve done it once before. You may chain these together to repeat absurd acrobatic performances, or retread simple, usually time-wasteful actions with total efficiency.

objects.title: Will to Power (Mag. 1)
objects.text: You can manually control your own motivations, totally divulging your will from the desires of your physical body. In doing so, you can effectively kill any petty attachments keeping you from your current goals, remain unflinchingly motivated to complete tasks for days without sleep, and simply ignore pain and grueling conditions. Your body may deteriorate and your mind shrivel away, but your will is absolute.

objects.title: Accelerated Training (Mag. 3)
objects.text: Choose any human discipline or skill. You gain knowledge and prowess within that skill ten times faster than a normal human being. Your chosen discipline may be any achievable given the human faculties.

objects.title: Copycat (Mag. 4)
objects.text: If you see another person performing a physical feat, and that feat is possible given your physiology, you can replicate that physical feat yourself from then on. This may include video, audio, pictures, or in-person feats you witness.

objects.title: Custom Type Grey (Mag. 4)
objects.text: Create a small Type Grey ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 4, like other abilities within Tier 1. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Tinkerer (Mag. 9)
objects.text: You can reverse-engineer nearly anything, so long as you have ample time to examine it. The more complex the machinery involved, the more time it will take to reverse-engineer it, but even the most complex machinery created by the most prolific superhuman engineers is not outside your capabilities. Once learned, the fundamentals of the device you have dismantled will engrain themselves in your memory, allowing you to build a replica if you have the resources.

objects.title: Supertask (Mag. 7)
objects.text: When you are completing a long task, the speed at which you will work and calculate will accelerate exponentially over time, limited only by the speed at which the human body can possibly move. In minutes, you could be in a state of mad genius, and in hours be moving with the speed and precision of a factory in every task you complete.

objects.title: Scholar (Mag. 9)
objects.text: In a few weeks, you are capable of learning everything you might learn from a Ph.D program or other form of higher education, and may extend beyond this point as you deem appropriate to develop greater knowledge. Moreover, you require minimal introductory knowledge which is widely available to independently come to all the conclusions on the subject which have been made throughout human history up to the modem day. As a result, only the most basic outside information is necessary to begin this process.

objects.title: Independent Review (Mag. 8)
objects.text: In any task, you become aware of flaws in what you have just done the moment a flaw or human error is committed, and your mind will simply never make that same mistake twice if you are capable of doing so. This, in essence, guarantees a totally flawless end product in any feat of design, and exponentially minimizes the possibility of natural error as you perform basic intellectual and physical tasks. It can be exploited to slowly but surely learn to perform tasks you are completely unfamiliar with through trial and error, such as high-level mathematics or otherwise.

objects.title: Assessment (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
Your mind will automatically utilize all the information at its disposal to
generate as many possible solutions to any problem you’re aware of. The moment a combat scenario begins, you will have several thousand escape routes in mind and hundreds of strategies for hundreds of possible powers your opponent may possess. When you sit down to develop technology, your mind will formulate millions of ways to assemble circuits, fuel cells, and motor components in a superweapon. This ability can only use information you’re aware of as fodder for these solution sets, and any solutions may be subject to your own ignorance or deception if these apply.

objects.title: Custom Type Grey (Mag. 9)
objects.text: Create a Type Grey ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 9, like other abilities within Tier 2. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Inhuman Performance (Mag. 12)
objects.text: If it is possible for you to achieve a physical feat given your body, you are capable of completing said feat. As such, your aim with firearms is atomically accurate, you can survive falls from absurd heights, you are a literally perfect hand-to-hand machine of death, and you have the highest conceivable degree of skill at every physical discipline known to man, and more. You could perform brain surgery with one hand, recreate the Mona Lisa with the other, and fence a master swordsman using your teeth simultaneously. You must know what you want to do in order to do it.

objects.title: Transistor Architect (Mag. 11)
objects.text: You have a Tesla-esque inherent understanding in matters of waves, transistors, electricity, circuits, power, and atomic behavior, scaled to the most absurd degree possible. That is, you could recreate all the achievements of modern computing, communication, quantum physics, cybernetics, and far more, with merely a jumble of wires and raw materials, and take them far further than we ever have. Quantum computing, gauss cannons, EMPs, artificial intelligence, and electromagnetic propulsion will all be as sticks and rocks to you in a matter of weeks. Who knows what you might develop come months or years.

objects.title: Motion Designer (Mag. 12)
objects.text: The principles of motion, structure, patterns, and thermodynamics within our physical world are burned into your mind in a way not even the most skilled architect, physicist, or engineer can replicate, maximized to degrees a normal person simply cannot conceive of. Modern hydraulics, vehicles, spacecraft, and nuclear reactors will, within a few weeks, seem like something a monkey would’ve conceived. Interstellar spacecraft, antimatter weaponry, UFO-esque propulsion, and human-like robotics are all easily achievable in a matter of weeks. In years, civilization itself could be shaped by your achievements.

objects.title: Biochemist (Mag. 12)
objects.text: The principles of molecular and chemical reactions, valence electrons, genetic engineering, and biological life are all as intuitive to you as breathing is to a normal person. Merely by imagining a lifeform, you immediately begin considering how you would sequence its DNA, how its body would be structured, and how you’d go about bringing one into existence. Modern medicine and cloning technology looks as primitive as leeches and plague doctors to you, and within no time you’ll be parsing every advancement of the current era out with a far superior solution. Chemical compounds that have nearly any effect on the body you can imagine, custom-created biological life, nanoviruses that perform computations, and many more advancements are only a matter of time.

objects.title: Numerologist (Mag. 11)
objects.text: Your mind is truly perfect in all areas of mathematics, probability, metrology, topology, and so on. When you look at the world, you know every measure of every occurring stimulus to billions of decimal places, and naturally formulate accurate probabilities for every scenario and circumstance you’re aware of. If you ever became involved In finance or gambling, you’d feasibly make billions. As you become aware of more things in general, your probable predictions become more and more accurate, with perfect understanding giving you absolute certainty concerning the end scenario of any given event. Everything you see is measured within your mind perfectly, from the width of every hair on every person’s head to the speed of every air particle in the wind.

objects.title: Custom Type Grey (Mag. 12)
objects.text: Create a Type Grey ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 12, like other abilities within Tier 3. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Atlas: (Mag 16)
objects.text: You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Grey. You have a near-limitless capacity to acquire and master skills of any variety, create genius inventions and techniques, and attain within minutes what mastery a lesser man might in lifetimes. Moreover, you require no outside knowledge to begin learning these skills, so long as you have sufficient materials. Spend a day in study and develop interplanetary space travel in your backyard. A week, and travel between stars and galaxies. An hour, and develop a cure for mankind s deadliest illnesses. While the most obvious application of these abilities is in science and technology, you are by no means limited to it: in mere minutes, you could become a master of martial arts, and in hours be creating fighting styles of your own. A day s practice could make you humanity’s greatest detective, or its finest doctor, or its most talented artist, or its most charismatic leader. When you acquire new skills and expertise, you will never forget or become incapable of your peak accomplishments, meaning that with time you will inevitably become a veritable swiss army knife of incredible scientific knowledge, Olympic feats of physical strength and skill, and much, much more. In a matter of months, your technologies could advance civilization to its extremes, or make you into a transhumanist god. Nanobot enhancement, genetic recoding, cybernetics, quantum computing, and more may within mere days be in your grasp. Who but you could imagine what might be possible in a year, or a decade. Your talent in all disciplines is quite literally all-encompassing. You are become the overman.

objects.title: Silver Tongue (Mag. 3)
objects.text: If you tell a lie to someone, and there is no direct evidence of the contrary they are aware of, they will believe it. If this ability fails, they will become aware that you attempted to influence them through superhuman means. This effect ends if they discover evidence to the contrary of your lie

objects.title: Empty Presence (Mag. 4)
objects.text: At will, you may become far less easily noticed, especially among others. In this state, most actions other than those which are loud, bright, or exceptionally noticeable will not register to others, such as covert killing, theft, and so on.

objects.title: Arachnid (Mag. 4)
objects.text: You may freely walk, run, crawl, and climb on walls as if gravity were selectively shifting around you. This drastically opens up your movement capabilities, and allows for angles of ambush not possible for normal human beings.

objects.title: Paranoia (Mag. 3)
objects.text: You can see 360 degrees around your body, even where no eyes exist physiologically. Your visual and auditory sensitivity to motion are drastically increased, and, like a fly, you can sense subtle changes in air pressure before sound waves reach your ears, so as to avoid danger that cannot be seen or heard.

objects.title: Disjoint (Mag. 4)
objects.text: The structure of the bones in your body is loose at best. Your joints can accept new connections, even to bones which would not fit physiologically, and you may dislocate and move every bone in your body prehenisley. All of these allow you to be an incredible contortionist, moving in ways the body was never meant to move.

objects.title: Custom Type Black (Mag. 4)
objects.text: Create a small Type Black ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 4, like other abilities within Tier 1. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Deadly Gaze (Mag. 7)
objects.text: You may induce horrifying, Datura-esque hallucinations in anyone who makes direct eye contact with you. These may involve manipulations of any of the five primary senses, and so long as their overall effect is terrifying, you may manipulate exactly what these hallucinations entail. Depending on the mental strength of your foe, they may be simply caught off guard or completely compromised for days on end by the terror you inflict upon them.

objects.title: Clonewarp (Mag. 8)
objects.text: You may teleport short distances within your line of sight, and have the ability to leave behind an identical copy of yourself if you so choose, whose actions you may control remotely. This copy dissipates if it is killed or if you leave a clone behind in another location, meaning you can only ever have one clone available at a time. This clone can act physically, may use any powers you have, and is fully under your control.

objects.title: Doppelganger (Mag. 9)
objects.text:
You may take on the exact likeness of anyone you come into
physical contact with, and shift back at will. Once you have mimicked someone before, you can mimic them again as many times as you see fit. If you kill someone after having acquired their likeness, you also acquire all their memories.

objects.title: In The Mist (Mag. 8)
objects.text: You can generate an obscuring fog which can act as a prehensile force appreciable to wind. The mist itself is an exceedingly potent sedative hallucinogen, and may be made extremely dense or evenly dispersed to produce greater physiological effects or greater concealment respectively. The hallucinogenic agent itself causes nightmarish paranoia and troubling visions in those who consume it, except for you naturally.

objects.title: Dark Metal (Mag. 7)
objects.text: Your body steadily produces a brittle, durable metal much like graphite, which may seep from your pores and be shaped according to your will, or fly from your body in deadly shrapnel shards at absurd speeds. This has any number of conceivable applications, from shaping it into keyholes to pick locks, to using it as a protective temporary armor, to creating crude bladed weapons from nothingness. This material can run out and require time to replenish if you should use it extravagantly.

objects.title: Custom Type Black (Mag. 9)
objects.text: Create a Type Black ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 9, like other abilities within Tier 2. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Void Bum (Mag. 12)
objects.text:
When you touch an object, you may ignite it with vantablack flames
that can consume nearly any solid or liquid matter. This fire will spread to objects in contact with
the original object you touched, though it will do so more slowly than normal fire. The rate of
consumption for this fire is proportional to the density of the matter it is consuming, and your
skill in the Type Black domain. You may force the fires to die down at will. The flames will spread
slower the longer it has been since you placed them, but will continue indefinitely unless there is
no more solid or liquid matter around them to spread to. As such, merely coming into contact with you is a death sentence for most; at best, they can amputate their limbs frantically to avoid certain annihilation; at worst, they will spread these flames to others and the environment as they bum to death.

objects.title: Destiny Vampire (Mag. 12)
objects.text: With a touch, the neck being the optimal location, you can causally siphon years from the lives of others. This does not physically age them, but guarantees via causality that they will die earlier, while you will be guaranteed by causality to die later in proportion to what you take. If someone is certain to survive for some period (such as by the effects of powers, time travel, etc), you may still add years to your own life, but will not subtract from theirs. The rate at which you may do so is in years per minute, increasing as you become more skilled, until you may feasibly drain someone within minutes of their life, and watch them get hit by the nearest car or drop dead by a stroke as you release them. Moreover, using this ability in a fight essentially guarantees that you won’t die during the engagement, unless higher-level fate manipulation is at play. You may manually control how much time you take below your maximum as you see fit.

objects.title: Death Defiant (Mag. 11)
objects.text: You may create temporary lifelines and woundlines between others, including yourself, via touch. This means that you may transfer wounds between yourself and anyone you have touched within a matter of hours to heal yourself or them, and make the lives of others dependent on your survival, or transfer wounds between valuable targets, or link people together to domino them to death. You can make these lifelines and woundlines one-way, if you would like to be the sole catalyst of death in another. Furthermore, you may openly make others aware of the lifelines you possess at any given time to deter retaliation. In this way, you can be a mobile hostage situation at any time, or alternatively heal others by taking on their wounds, or heal yourself by transferring wounds to a durable teammate or a foe. To remove, add, or alter these links, you must

objects.title: Memento Mori (Mag. 11)
objects.text: When toggled at will, it is impossible for people to recall that you exist, or remember any detail of who you may be or what you are capable of. Even if eyes are taken off of you for a single blink, the affected individuals will immediately forget who it is they are looking at. This both acts as a means by which you can avoid any and all consequences for unsavory actions, but also prevents your arsenal of powers from ever becoming predictable, and disorients any and all opponents you could have. Combined with abilities that prevent you from being easily sensed or kept track of, you could be truly unstoppable.

objects.title: Ghost Touch (Mag. 12)
objects.text: You may become intangible and/or invisible at will, and may do so for selective portions of your body as you see fit. This in itself has a number of uses, but it’s application to combat is its most deadly use: when you become tangible after having been intangible, all matter that you are intangibly present within is pushed with nigh-indomitable force to suit your position. Placing a hand inside a foe and becoming tangible would leave a hole in his chest; doing so to a steel door would leave a hole the size of your body to walk through, and placing a simple finger in the neck is enough to kill all but high-level regenerators. In essence, you have the means to inflict truly gruesome bodily harm with just a touch, along with considerable stealth and infiltration abilities.

objects.title: Custom Type Black (Mag. 12)
objects.text: Create a Type Black ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 12, like other abilities within Tier 3. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Phobos: (Mag 17)
objects.text:
You have attained the pinnacle power of Type Black. You may walk and crawl on walls freely. You may enter a spectre-like state of true imperceptibility and intangibility, and you do not technically exist in space while this ability is active. Furthermore, you may not be the target of intent to do harm: fingers on triggers will paralyze in place, daggers aimed for your heart will stop in their owner's hand before so much as laying a scratch on you, and more. This includes attempts to harm via collateral damage. Even those who do not know you are directly present, such as one readying an explosive in your general area, will not be capable of acting upon this potentially harmful choice. In essence, it is impossible for someone to target you, accidentally or otherwise. If you are ever perceived, whether through a photo, a video, by voice, by name, or directly, you are made aware of this fact, and may manipulate any of the senses, perceptions, or memories of the one who detected you, supernatural or otherwise: in the simple case, you could erase their memory of you. In the more devious case, you could disorient them by creating torturous scenarios, and extend these by distorting their sense of time. In the strategic case, you could manipulate their memories until they believe their allies are their enemies, or that your foes have killed their loved ones, causing them to retaliate viciously. This ability activates before your true nature may be perceived, and so you may easily appear as if a hideous monstrosity, or an esteemed guest, or any other person to hapless onlookers, essentially capable of illusory shapeshifting.

Finally, in your spectre-state, instead of becoming nonexistent, you can become an entity of negative-existence if you desire. While you are no longer imperceptible and intangible, in this form you are an inky silhouette, and any matter you come into contact with, if you desire, will immediately dissipate from existence as if consumed by a black hole. In sum, you are utterly untouchable to your foes, and subtle to the point of total imperceptibility. You are the very emptiness itself.

objects.title: Mutamorph: (Mag. 4)
objects.text: You may grant yourself subtle unnatural features which are biologically possible, so long as you are recognizably yourself to the average observer. This may include bioluminescence, altered olfactory and auditory organs, changed skin or vocal tone, and so on. These alterations may not alter your vital organs, brain, or musculature.

objects.title: Endocrinologist: (Mag. 4)
objects.text: When you are in physical contact with another (yourself included), you may alter the behavior of their endocrine system in nearly any nonlethal way. This may include hiking up their natural recovery, giving them a slew of performance enhancing chemicals, induce intense anger, sadness, or joy, and so on.

objects.title: Jackal: (Mag. 3)
objects.text: You may at any time enter a transformative state, granting you increased height, strength, stamina and kinesthetic awareness within natural human limits. Your fingers will transform into sharpened, animal-like claws, and your teeth will become as sharp as steak knives. In this state, your vision in the dark is drastically enhanced, as is your bone density and pain threshold.

objects.title: Chameleon: (Mag. 3)
objects.text: :You may alter the pigmentation of your skin at will with incredible detail, and this power may automatically reflect colors behind you at any time. From a far distance or by an unkeen observer, you might appear nearly invisible if unmoving.

objects.title: Chlorophyll: (Mag. 2)
objects.text: Your physical needs may all be met by regular exposure to sunlight. At will, you may allow your cells to generate internal chloroplasts, granting you a green blush.While this is active, sunlight will sustain you for five times the period in which you are in sunlight. You may toggle this ability to return to your usual appearance.

objects.title: Custom Type Yellow (Mag. 4)
objects.text: Create a small Type Yellow ability which is thematically appropriate, follows the rules of Aberrants, and does not exceed a Magnitude of 4, like other abilities within Tier 1. You may fill this slot with one custom power.

objects.title: Animorph: (Mag. 8)
objects.text:
You may take on the form of any animal from whatever planet you hail
from. If you are from Earth, you could feasibly transform into anything from an extremophile to a rhinoceros to a bengal tiger with ease. If you are not from Earth, you have access to all the alien species that exist there, whatever that may entail.

objects.title: Shapeshift: (Mag. 7)
objects.text:
You may alter the shape of yourself and those you are in contact with
so long as these changes are within your species’s phenotype. In practice, this means you can both cosmetically alter yourself and also replicate the appearance of anyone on Earth. This also means you are effectively ageless, so long as you regularly shapeshift into a younger version of yourself.

objects.title: Parasite: (Mag. 8)
